In August 1995, the whole world was engulfed in war for the third time. There were several causes, but at the end of the day, it was simply a matter of the Eastern powers tipping the scales to correct the "balance of power" that had begun to crumble. But with tanks and missiles in both hands.
The focus of the fighting was in Central Europe, the economic and cultural center. Two hundred thousand Red Army soldiers, who were supposed to be reduced in number, crossed the East-West German border one after another, supplementing and defeating NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) forces that were moving in surprise attacks at various points. Hamburg and Haber fell on the second day of the faith, and Bremen on the third day. On the North German Plain, the traditional West German armored divisions also faced the oncoming Red Storm, but they had a hard time.
The fighting within West Germany was coming to an end. A Red Army tank division surrounded the Ruhr industrial area. The garrison resisted stubbornly, but its destruction was only a matter of time.
Around that time, the U.S. contingent, finally on European soil, began its advance. To save Europe, which was in dire straits.

This game simulates a possible battle in Europe in the near future. If the Warsaw Pact forces, led by the Soviet Union, invade West

—description from the back of the box (translated)

「1995年8月、三度全世界が戦火に包まれた。その原因は幾つかあったが、詰まる所は崩れ始めた「力の均衡（バランス・オブ・パワー）」を是正するために、東側諸国が秤に手を加えただけの事である。ただし、両手に戦車とミサイルを持って。
戦いの焦点は経済・文化の中心、中央ヨーロッパであった。削減されたはずの赤軍兵士20万人は、次々と東西ドイツ国境を越え、各所で奇襲に動じるNATO（北大西洋条約機構）軍を補足し、撃破していった。信仰2日目にしてハンブルクとハーバーが、3日目にはブレーメンが陥落した。北ドイツ平原でも伝統ある西ドイツ装甲師団が襲いくる赤い嵐に立ち向かっていたが、苦戦を強いられた。
西ドイツ国内の戦いは終わりを迎えようとしていた。赤軍戦車師団がルール工業地帯を包囲したのである。守備隊は頑強に抵抗したが、壊滅は時間の問題だった。
その頃、ようやくヨーロッパの地を踏んだアメリカ派遣軍が進撃を開始した。窮地に立たされたヨーロッパを救うために。

このゲームは近い将来、起こりうるヨーロッパでの戦闘をシミュレートしています。もし、ソ連を中心とするワルシャワ条約機構軍が西ドイツに攻め込んできたら、果たしてヨーロッパは誰の手に落ちるのでしょうか？ 同シリーズ第4作『北海道侵攻』と並んだ問題作です。」

—description from the back of the box

name: Die Legenden von Andor: Dunkler Magier
description: These cards contain four new bosses „Dunkler Magier“ for legend 3 of the base game and bring more variance. They are part of the new graphic novel „Die Legenden von Andor - Varkurs Erwachen“.

name: Hellboy: The Board Game – Unexpected Plot Twist
description:
Unexpected Plot Twist is a limited edition Deck of Doom card for Hellboy: The Board Game. Unexpected Plot Twist given to backers of the Kickstarter campaign for the documentary "Mike Mignola: Drawing Monsters" who backed at a physical reward tier.

The Lead Agent rolls a red die and performs the following based on the value shown:
0-1: Place 2 Minion D in their area
2-3: Lead Agent heals health equal to the die roll
categories: Adventure, Comic Book / Strip, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fighting, Horror
mechanics: Area Movement, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Modular Board, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Player Powers

name: Zap Trap: The Jolt Jumpin' Electronic Game!
description: A multipiece maze with a metallic coating that can be energized by a battery in the base. The players take turns running a wand through the maze. If you hit the maze a headpiece will play a tone and vibrate. Fastest through the maze without hitting the maze wins.

name: Escape Game Pocket: La Pirámide del Faraón
description:
A pyramid containing centuries and centuries of history, with many puzzles to solve like a true detective in order to get out and unlock the front door!

La pirámide del faraón esconde misterios y secretos ancestrales que sólo un verdadero detective puede descubrir resolviendo los acertijos.

name: Harry Potter: Wizarding Quiz
description: In this quiz game, players represent their Hogwarts houses, answering trivia questions. The house with most points wins in the end.

name: Loose Tarot Readings
description:
"Your loose tarot readings help me to heal."
It's a communication game where everyone can enjoy talking with each other about real problems.
Tarot reading has been developed as a fun game to play!
You can consult your worries and feel like a fortune teller with the original tarot cards that can be loosely enjoyed even for the first time, while maintaining the deep meaning of tarot cards.
The game can be played face-to-face, online, or alone as an easy way to enjoy tarot reading.
One person is the questioner, and the others are the fortune tellers, and they draw tarot cards and get inspiration from the cards or connect them to keywords or patterns.
The person who gives the best fortune-telling wins.
Let's find out what kind of fortune-telling will make the person think "I like that!

name: Radical Queer Witches
description:
Radical Queer Witches is a prompt and answer style card game with 140 prompt cards and 300 answer cards.

There is absolutely nothing in this game against marginalized people. Zero racism, transphobia, homophobia, sexism, Islamophobia, anti-Semitism, fatphobia, or ableism. Instead, we address issues of race, oppression, and white supremacy by focusing on and holding those who benefit accountable.

—description from the publisher

name: Sweet Dog Hotel
description:
This is a resort hotel where only dogs can stay.
There are five elegant hotels on the premises, and there is an adjoining big dog park.
As co-owners of this resort hotel, you aim to create rooms in the hotel under construction and invite dogs.

However, in order to have many dogs stay at the hotel, it is necessary to win the competition among owners and create guest rooms that are highly satisfying.
Can you become a reputable hotel owner?

A player places a tile on the board and places a dog token on the tile.
When a tile is placed on the board, the dog token in the dog run moves according to its location.
This dog token serves as a time track.
The player behind the time track always takes a turn.

The game ends when the pile of tiles is exhausted, and a battle for majority is played in each area.
The Victory Points are awarded according to the ranking in the battle for majority, and the player with the highest total score wins the game.

-description from designer
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Tile Placement, Turn Order: Time Track

name: ABC Boom
description:
A game of words and balance: you have to be the first to put all your letters on the board. But before adding a letter to the building, it will be necessary to indicate a word that contains this letter and be careful not to drop everything! Vocabulary and skills will be needed to master of letters!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Gioco di parole ed equilibrio: devi essere il primo a mettere tutte le tue lettere sul tabellone. Ma prima di aggiungere una lettera all’edificio, sarà necessario indicare una parola che contiene questa lettera e fare attenzione a non far cadere tutto! Vocabolario e abilità saranno necessari per padroneggiare l’intaglio delle lettere!


Un gioco di equilibrio e vocabolario.
Richiede una buona dose di autocontrollo per mantenere le lettere in equilibrio E un buon vocabolario per trovare la parola giusta.


—description from the publisher

name: Twilight of the Gods: Age of Tribulations
description:
Standalone expansion for Twilight of the Gods, introducing two new factions, Avarice and Devotion, each featuring new cards and mechanics.

In Twilight of the Gods you and your friends will each assume the role of a deity from myth and legend, and battle to the death to see who is the strongest god, using human armies, mystical beasts, and heroes of renown from both past and future.

Choose a Strategy: Aggression, Avarice, Devotion, Negotiation, Mysticism, or Sanctuary to influence your battle.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Deck Construction, Hand Management, Memory, Open Drafting, Trading, Variable Player Powers

name: Shaft
description:
Shaft is a 3-6 player game in which a motley crew of space prospectors must flee a ravenous alien, weighing up a balance between working together to keep the alien at bay and betraying each other to be the first (and only) one to escape with their life

Instead of taking turns, everyone plays cards from their hand face down each round. Can you trust your fellow crewmates? Or will you stab them in the back and go it alone? At the end of the round all of the cards played are revealed and resolved simultaneously, and everyone's true intentions are uncovered!

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Bluffing, Comic Book / Strip, Deduction, Party Game, Science Fiction

name: Family Party
description:
The goal of the game is to strengthen family well-being and allow family members to feel united and strong together.
To play, the Challenge cards and the Bonus cards must be shuffled and 15 are randomly selected by placing them face down in the center of the table, thus forming the deck of Game cards.
Each card contains a challenge. The challenge is described on the card and also clarified through some icons that indicate the time and the game mode.
Whoever wins a challenge earns the points indicated on the card and passes the turn to the player with the fewest points, in case of a tie to the player on his left.
The player who has earned the most points at the end of the Game deck wins. In case of a tie, the youngest player.

—user summary

name: Polyminix
description: Polyminix is ​​a game of logic and concentration, with different levels of difficulty. Each player must combine the individual pieces (pentominoes, tetrominoes, etc.) to be able to cover the geometric shape drawn on the card.

name: Everyone Else Thinks This Game is Awesome: Pseudoscience Booster
description: Adds more than 100 additional questions and facts about the questionable.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Party Game, Trivia

name: Amapatoliztli Tonalpohualli
description:
The Amapatoliztli Tonalpohualli is a deck of cards based on the Nahuatl ritual calendar or Tonalpohuall.

The game presents different game modes, you may play by numbers, symbols, colors, or elements.
Then, you have different rules according to what variation of the game you want to play.
One of the most common ways to win is by playing all of the cards in your hand before anybody else.

name: Holly e Benji: Captain Tsubasa
description:
Challenge the strongest national teams in the world of Holly e Benji (aka Captain Tsubasa)
All the best players of the Japanese league come together to challenge the great world national teams: Italy, Germany, France and Argentina.

Choose a team and put your players on the pitch.
Use the special abilities of the characters to be able to move and shoot.
Always keep your defenses high and be alert to make a quick retreat, the opposing coach will certainly not miss the opportunity to be able to move quietly towards your goal.
Unmark your players and advance towards the opponent's goal, being careful not to discover yourself too much.
Play an exciting tournament and, by choosing winning strategies, allow your players to score or defend the result.
Show your opponent the validity of the game tactics you set up and lead your team to victory.

—user summary
categories: Comic Book / Strip, Fantasy, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Sports
mechanics: Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Movement Points

name: 国葬最前線 (National Funeral Frontline)
description:
Players will become supporters of famous people who have passed away this year, and campaign to make their funerals as wonderful as possible.

However, in order for them to be given state funerals, the consent of the people is required. Now is the time to question the pros and cons of state funerals!

Players vote secretly on which celebrities will move up the ladder to the top. When a celebrity gets to the top of the ladder, players vote on whether the celebrity deserves a state funeral. Players score according to the end rank of the celebrities they secretly chose.

name: Dixit: Family Puzzle Promo Card
description:
Promo card from the Dixit Puzzle called "Family"

The Dixit Puzzle Collection contains 14 different Puzzles with Dixit artworks, 6 with 500 Parts and 8 with 1000 part.

Each puzzle contains a unique promo card different from the artwork on the puzzle.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game
mechanics: Race, Simultaneous Action Selection, Storytelling, Targeted Clues, Voting

name: The How I Survived Game
description:
Your bed is floating in an ocean! Your dog turned into a zombie! How will you survive? To play, the judge for the round draw a scenario card and reads the ridiculous scenario out loud. The other players race to grab object chips! Will that toilet bowl help you? What about the pogo stick? Once you have your chips, you’ll have to stretch your imagination to create your own survival plan. Practice improvisation and make your plan clever, creative or funny – whatever it takes to convince the judge to award you survival rations. How will you defeat a giant llama with hot sauce? Or will you survive lunch-lady ninjas with a bucket of worms? This wild and weird think-on-your-feet game will have your kids in fits of giggles! And whoever has the most survival rations at the end of the game wins!


Create your best survival plan with only your brain power and whatever 3 wacky objects you manage to grab!
Kids practice creative thinking, problem-solving and improvisation
Fun party game for kids and adults
For 4 or more players
Includes 55 double-sided object chips, 80 survival scenario cards, 75 scoring rations, 30-second timer and instructions


—description from the publisher

name: Seep
description:
Seep is a classic Indian card game played between 2 or 4 players using a standard 52-card pack without jokers. Seep is more over popular in Indian, Pakistan and few other Asian countries.

The aim of the Seep game is to capture cards worth points from a layout on the table (also known as the floor). The game ends when one team has accumulated a lead of at least 100 points over the other team (this is called a baazi). Players can decide in advance how many games (baazis) they want to play.

At the end of the seep round the scoring value of the captured cards is counted: (1) All cards of the Spade suit have point values corresponding to their capture value (from the king, worth 13, down to the ace, worth 1), (2) The aces of the other three suits are also worth 1 point each, and (3) The ten of diamonds is worth 6 points.

Players can also score for a seep, which occurs when a player captures all the cards from the layout, leaving the table empty. Normally a seep is worth 50 points, but a seep made on the very first play is worth only 25 points, and a seep made on the last play is worth no points at all.

name: The 3 Keys to the Abbey
description:
This game fosters the comprehension of the history, architecture and daily life of the monks of the Abbey of Mont-Saint-Michel as the players exchange explicative and illustrated cards (photos, drawings). With the help of these cards, the players can recompose the ground plan of the buildings of the Abbey, level by level, from the crypts below to the Archangel above.

—description from the back of the box

Two players (or four players as teams) compete to build their own tri-level plan of Mont St Michel. Cards are drawn to get a map card matched with two corresponding game cards. When this happens, one map card can be laid down. 12 map cards need to be played to finish the plan with a last card, "The Archangel St. Michael", played for the player (or 2-player team) to win the game.

name: What's the Meaning of LIFE
description:
The witty and clever game of headlines! This fun multi-player party game is perfect for family game night, or a night-in with your friends.

Think of entertaining captions that would best suit the photos. Let your peers decide who produced the best one! The player with the most brilliant one-liners, wins!

—description from the publisher

name: Convoy Hunt!
description:
This is a wargame rule system to recreate simple, fast playing World War Two era submarine actions with miniatures on the tabletop. The rules are for solo or co-op play where the players command the U-boats and the game handles the convoy of allied merchants ships.

Players will roll command dice against their submarine's crew skill in order to take actions. Failed actions will allow the convoy to move for each fail. The U-boats will be in a race to sink or damage as many ships as possible before the convoy makes it safely off the board. It takes skill and luck to maneuver and line up your shots.

The game can also add hazards to the U-boats in the form of escorts and aircraft that will attempt to sink them by bombing, ramming or depth charges if they are detected during play.

Victory is determined by the number of ships sunk, if any, before the convoy exits the board. Submarine players loose if they do poorly or are sunk during the contact.

—description from the designer
categories: Miniatures, Nautical, Wargame, World War II

name: Mit Trick & Tücke
description:
Two competing secret societies: On the one hand, the mystical and traditional Thorn Society, whose followers come from the most influential families. With their strict structures and their eloquent appearance, they have been operating in secret for many decades.
On the other hand, the new "machine clan" with a soft spot for steam-powered devices. Emerging from the underground, their behavior often seems clumsy, as they like to rely on their muscular strength when exchanging arguments.

But which one is most likely to give you power and money? If you play cold-blooded enough and change sides at the right moment, you will triumph in the end.

Gameplay:
It is played clockwise. On your turn, you must perform one of the following two actions:
ACT or PAUSE

ACT
Play 1 card from your hand face up in front of you and immediately resolve the card effect.

PAUSE
Return all of your played cards back to your hand.

Then it is the next person's turn.
mechanics: Alliances, Hand Management, Lose a Turn, Take That

name: Twins
description: Can you find the twin first? Each player has exactly one twin animal in their home that matches one of the animals on the card in the middle of the table. Race to find Twins as quickly as you can.

name: Kidimime
description:
SPEED AND MIMING GAME

Watch your teammate as they mime, and work out which character they’re pretending to be.

The fastest player to recognize the mime of his teammate wins the round. The first team to win 5 rounds wins the game.

Quick thinking and great concentration are key
if you want to win. Fun, giggles and games guaranteed!

-description from publisher

name: Odysseia
description:
A simple roll and move game by the greek firm EPA.
Move plastic ship pawns by dice, from TROIA to ITHAKA.
Nice colourful board and a box with gor the time outständing graphics.

name: Qui connaît quoi?
description: Choose the opponent who will answer the 5 questions related to a theme and use your divinatory powers to predict the number of correct answers. Your predictions are correct, score extra points!

name: Carnaval Magnet
description:
SPEED AND DEXTERITY GAME
At the carnival, the parade is marching by, but everything is higgledy-piggledy... It all needs to be put back in order at once, which is a real challenge when you can't see!

Caranaval Magnet is a game of dexterity, memory and speed. A start card shows players how to place their counters on their board, which they then put inside their bag. They turn a challenge card over, and the first player to rearrange their counters in the order shown on it wins the card; No peeking!
The first player to win 5 challenge cards wins the game

—description from the publisher

name: Timeline Access+
description:
Discover the Access+ version of the popular Timeline memory and thinking game, which has been adapted for players living with cognitive disorders.

The cards are bigger for easier handling, the events were carefully selected to make them accessible to as many people as possible and a pack of Personal Experiences cards has been created specifically for the Access+ version so that players can look back on events in their own life.

This version has the same instructions as the original game: Players create a timeline by placing the cards they draw in the correct order of the events depicted on them. The adaptions make it possible for everyone to play together and have a great time.

Timeline Access+ stimulates memory, thinking, attention and planning, among other functions.

—description from the publisher

name: Cortex Access+
description:
Discover the Access+ version of the popular Cortex Challenge game, which has been adapted for players living with cognitive disorders.

The cards are bigger for easier handling, the challenges were carefully selected to make them accessible to as many people as possible, an answer booklet was added to make caregivers’ work easier, and two levels of difficulty are now proposed in the rules.

The instructions are the same as for the original game: Win the challenges to win the game. The adaptions make it possible for everyone to play together and have a great time.

Cortex Access+ stimulates attention, memory, thinking and calculation skills, among other functions.

—description from the publisher

name: Contrabando
description:
Contrabando is a strategy game for two players.
The player who moves the smugglers wants to get their pawns across the border (line in red and white).
The player who moves the tax guard and the dogs, pretends to arrest as many smugglers as possible.

The fiscal guard is positioned in the center of the third row (row with the red and white line), with his four dogs at his side, two on each side. The nine smugglers are placed in the 1st row on the other side of the game board.

The smugglers move, square by square, forwards and sideways. Walking backwards is not allowed.
The dogs move diagonally, as many squares as they want, forwards and backwards.
The tax guard moves square by square in all directions.

Dogs and smugglers cannot knock opposing pawns off the board.
Dogs can only impede the smugglers' advance (by positioning themselves in front of them).
The tax guard arrests the smugglers when the first occupies a square occupied by the second. The fiscal guard stays in that square and the smuggler is removed and placed in one of the nine dark gray squares (at the bottom of the board), thus being out of the game.

The game ends when there are no smugglers in the green area of the board.
The smugglers who crossed the border are counted. Then the board is turned over and the player who played with the smugglers now plays with the tax guard and the four dogs.
After the second game, the smugglers who crossed the border are counted again.
The player who manages to get the most smugglers across the border after two games is the winner.
mechanics: Grid Movement, Square Grid, Static Capture

name: Mini Colourbrain
description:
YOU START WITH THE ANSWERS
All the answers you need in Colourbrain are in your hand. And they’re all colours!

300 COLOURFUL QUESTIONS
What colour is the lid on full-fat milk… what colour is a sharon fruit… which colour cards would you put down?

ALL NEW QUESTIONS
This mini version of the game contains 120 brand new questions. Play it on its own or combine it with the full-sized version

name: Typical Spanish: Un Juego Muy Nuestro
description:
Typical Spanish is a pop culture familiar party game. Create 2 groups and win by imitating, drawing, mimicking or answer correctly trivia questions about Spanish culture. Let's start the party and have some fun with friends ¡Olé!

Typical spanish es el primer juego de mesa familiar tipo party con pruebas sobre la cultura española más gamberra, ¡olé!
Imitar, dibujar, hacer mímica o adivinar solo serán algunas de las cosas que tendréis que hacer para ganar el juego de mesa más Typical Spanish
¡Qué comience el sarao! Tira un dado para saber de qué categoría tendréis que jugar la tarjeta durante esta ronda. El primer equipo que tenga una tarjeta de cada categoría ganará Typical Spanish, ¿quieres saber cuáles son?
Cómo está la people: si imitases a personajes muy nuestros como un bailaor flamenco, ¿crees que tu equipo lo adivinaría?
Hazte un Picasso: conviértete en un gran artista y pinta cosas como Naranjito para que los demás lo adivinen
Aquí hay tomate: hay frases míticas como ¡Hola, corazones!, ¿sabes quién las dijo por primera vez?
Spanish Trivial: preguntas sobre las cosas más curiosas de nuestra cultura y tres posibles respuestas. Sólamente una es la correcta
Blanco y en botella: decir expresiones españolas es muy sencillo, pero hacerlo moviendo los labios y gesticulando sin hablar para que el equipo las adivine es todo un reto
Pregúntale a Reverte: ¿podréis adivinar si las palabras propuestas están o no aceptadas por la RAE?
Ocupa poco espacio y sus cartas laminadas de calidad hacen que lo podáis jugar en casa, en la piscina, de viaje o en cualquier otro sitio

name: セッチューアン (Setchuan)
description:
A drawing game about compromise. The players work at a design firm and are torn between their bosses demands and their clients. For instance the boss wants them to draw an elephant, but the client wants them to draw a giraffe.

In the game, a theme card is revealed, and the players each try to draw something that will be a compromise between the two themes. The lead payer for the round will create a line of the drawings - from most fitting with the boss's theme to most fitting with the client's theme. The player whose drawing is in the middle position earns 1 point.

After a number of rounds, the person with the most points wins.

name: Hupszi
description:
Hupszi is a cute fluffy creature. You are on your way to the school with your best friend when you discover Hupszi in the bushes. After you give them your lunch and pet them you decide to take them to the school with you. But it turns out it was not the best idea because Hupszi is not very good at obeying rules and also it is strictly forbidden to bring pets to the school. You face a feally difficult challenge to keep Hupszi hidden from the teachers. Can you work together in perfect harmony to deal with the mischieves of Hupszi and save yourselves from going to the head teachers office?
This is a cooperative two player game. You each start with all your cards in your hands. There are two main type of cards: on watch, and snooze. You place the 3 teacher cards in the middle of the table. At the beginning of each round you flip the top Hupszi card and see what he is up to and where. Each teacher has their own territory, you see the symbols in the corner of the cards. The same symbols appear on the Hupszi cards so you see which teacher will be angry if Hupszi gets discovered. After you flipped the Hupszi card you each choose a card from your hand secretly then reveal it at the same time. If at least one of you played an on watch card you can put back the Hupszi card at the bottom of the deck. Buti f both of you were snoozing then Hupszi gets discovered and you place it by the teacher whose territory he was making a mess at. If a teacher catches you the 5th time you loose the game. If you manage to play all your cards twice in 2 rounds without being sent to the head teacher you are truly best friends whose minds are set on the same wavelenght.

name: KÖ-OP: THIS WÅY ÜP
description: A 17-card expansion for KÖ-OP full of new cards and rules that turn the base game on it's head.

name: Murder Mystery Party Case Files: Live Mission Game – Mission Black Hawk
description:
Agent Usher has disappeared and we fear has been taken out. Usher suspected high-ranking officials in MI6 of collaborating with the Zipacna cartel. New intelligence suggests that an unprecedented cyberattack is being planned by the cartel and the operation is happening now. Your mission is to break into the Cartel's house bank and steal the funds meant for the cyberattack. Mobilize field agents to prevent the attack in real time.

Mission Files:
Review the included mission information and Use WhatsApp or Telegram smartphone applications to communicate with the field agents and pull off the mission. Use photos, restaurant menus, emails, magazines, and more to plan the operation

Enclosed you will find the following:

Mission file folder (1)
Mission instructions and setup (3)
Operation materials and evidence (28)
Operative photos and dossier (7)
Links to online hints

name: Flower Field
description:
In a valley, the flowers bloom every year in spring. Many children often collect flowers and arrange them in a vase for a grandmother because she loves flowers and she is unable to climb the mountain to appreciate these flowers by herself.

Players will play as the children who collect flowers on the mountain and arrange them in a vase for this grandmother. If any person can arrange the most beautiful flower vase for a grandmother, that player will win the game.

name: Rebellion
description:
"This country has been in turmoil for a long time, and both lords and soldiers have been divided into two factions, the King's faction and the rebel faction. I beg you, my lords(players)! Please send your troops to the five scattered forts in the country and calm the chaos as soon as possible."

A card game where players battle over the control of five forts. The allegiance of each players (faction card) is kept secret. Take control of one of the five forts by playing up to five cards on each of them. Will your faction claim control of the forts and bring back balance to the land?

name: Caral: Sunset Promo
description:
Aim for even more variety during your game experience with these beautiful promo status cards.

Each promo card references mechanics introduces in one of the modules, making the respective modules even more exciting when combined with the status cards module.

—description from the publisher

name: Caral: Crawall Promo
description:
2 Custom Dice and 1 Alpaca figure, packed in a separate box.

The Alpaca figure is used as a starting player token.

The blue die serves for a slower movement of the architect figure from the base game while the red one speeds up his movement.

The dice could be used instead of the normal die or the starting player can decide, which die to be used for this turn.

This expansion was sold separately during the Kickstarter campaign.
categories: Ancient, City Building, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Auction: Once Around, Constrained Bidding, Race, Turn Order: Stat-Based

name: Don't BEE Last
description:
Take turns placing cards down and shouting out the correct color. Mess up and start over. Each player starts with 10 cards and takes turns placing cards down and shouting out the correct color on the card. The game is fast-paced, and turns quickly move around the table from player to player as they call out their colors. If a player misspeaks or says the wrong color, they collect the whole pile of cards on the table.

Oh yeah... and there are BEE cards. If a person places a BEE card in the center of the table, everyone has to slap the angry BEE. The person who slaps the BEE card last gets stung and has to add the whole pile to their hand.

The first person to get rid of all of their cards wins!

name: Mouse Mania
description:
Hands-On coding fun with the whole family!

Use coding cards to compute to your mouse's path around the board and collect cheese wedges. Block other players using mayswal's or duck through warp zones to zoom ahead. Develop problem solving in critical thinking as you race your mouse to victory!
mechanics: Action Queue, Area Movement, Programmed Movement, Race

name: Magic: The Gathering – Guilds of Ravnica Planeswalker Deck: Vraska, Regal Gorgon
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Vraska's life has been defined by violence and she will stop at nothing to bring justice to those who have wronged her. Fill your graveyard with creatures, then draw on the power of death to crush your foe.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Jekyll / Hyde
description:
You are the respected Dr. Jekyll, an honorable and philanthropic gentleman of Victorian London. Your life is divided between doing good deeds, making elixir, and controlling your inner monster — the dangerous and impulsive Mr. Hyde. Of course it's not all smooth sailing, but indulging the desires of the odious scoundrel and making money from him helps you to carry out your charitable work. How could it go wrong?

To win Jekyll / Hyde, the Good Deeds Counter must be at 6 and the Impulses Counter at 0 at the beginning of Dr. Jekyll's turn. You lose the game if, at the beginning of Mr. Hyde's turn, the Elixir Counter is 0 or the Tracked Counter is 6. If both counters meet these conditions, you also lose.

name: Go Fish Launch
description:
This big fish is hungry, and it’s LAUNCH time! Grab a launcher and let the fish food fly to the other side. Race to clear your side of all fish food first to win! No turns, no waiting, just start playing. Lots of laughs await! Set up and play in ~30 seconds!

—description from the publisher

name: Medical Crime Files: Patientenakte – Julia H.: Unter Beobachtung
description:
How did the bizarre chain of events that occurred on March 22, 2022 in Kratworn near Hensfeld come about? Does the main suspect Julia Hiffner pose a danger to the public and how can she be helped? Julia H.'s crime has shocked Hensfeld, but she has not spoken to anyone since her arrest. Is the young woman sane? What happened to her? And how can she be helped? By sifting through various clues and evidence, you must reconstruct the bizarre chain of events and diagnose the patient's condition. As a team of forensic psychologists, can you figure out what's going on in Julia H.'s head?
The "Crime Files" now on the theme of forensics and psychology.
Investigate and find diagnoses with realistically designed circumstantial evidence.
Written with advice from a board-certified psychologist.
The game is reusable, no material needs to be destroyed.

—description from the publisher

name: コードネーム　ボーナスパック　COOL JAPAN (Codenames: Bonus Pack – COOL JAPAN)
description:
New cards for Codenames.

"Game Market" like sales-only events.
Words chosen from words related to Japan

name: コードネーム　ボーナスパック　JAPAN2020 (Codenames: Bonus Pack 2 – Japan 2020)
description:
New cards for Codenames.

"Game Market" like sales-only events.
Words chosen from words related to Japan, 2020 news.

name: Magic: The Gathering – Core Set 2019 Planeswalker Deck: Ajani, Wise Counselor
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

A veteran warrior of unmatched skill, Ajani protects the weak and mentors aspiring heroes. Gather battalions of small fighters, bolster their strength, and overwhelm your opponent.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Star Wars: The Child's Cute Loot
description:
Collect, Attack, Take Naps!
Who doesn't love The Child? Featuring everyone's favourite character from popular series The Mandalorian, this officially licensed Star Wars game is great fun for all the family.
Collect Baby Yoda's favourite things in this cute yet cunning card game.

From tasty soup to delicious frogs, use your Force powers to get ahead and collect the most cards to win!

Players take it in turns to try and build up their stash of 'cute loot', or use one of three action cards to attempt to outwit their opponents. The first player to complete a set wins the game.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction

name: Hello Kitty and Friends: A Lotería Game
description: Go on adventures with Hello Kitty in an all-new way with this adorable version of Loteria, an English and Spanish version of the popular game of Bingo! Players win by matching images on their tablas with iconic characters, items, and places, such as Keroppi, Flowers (flores), and Hello Kitty’s Hotel (Hotel de Hello Kitty) illustrated in traditional Loteria style. Alternative rules also allow players to call clues using their Hello Kitty and Friends knowledge! Prepare for luck and learning with this unpredictable and educational game for Hello Kitty fans of all levels!

name: Лукави лисици: Шпиони (Sly foxes: Spies)
description:
Add more dynamism to your Sly Foxes game with 6 new types of cards. Unexpected twists, counterattacks, spies, and stealthy magpies. Expect the unexpected or call the helpful badger for help.

These cards are an expansion to the base game and cannot be played without it.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Добави още динамика към своята игра „Лукави лисици“ с 6 нови вида карти. Неочаквани обрати, контраатаки, шпиони и крадливи свраки. Очаквай неочакваното или извикай услужливия язовец на помощ.

Тези карти са разширение към базовата игра и не могат да се играят без нея.

—description from the publisher

name: Herken de Foto
description:
Players attempt to recognize photos while the picture is steadily revealed. The faster you recognize the photo, the more points you score.

Comes with a DVD with 300 photos in various categories.
Can be played individually or in teams.

name: My First Garden
description:
Gardening seems like a smooth, easy going and chill activity for those lazy summer days, however, becoming a real gardener requires a lot of hard work, knowledge and a ton of practice. Are you up for the challenge?

In My first Garden players will be assuming the role of first time gardeners and will compete against each other to create the most productive and fruit-full garden.


Design by Juan Agustín Maiolino (2021) for the 2nd Edo's "Stuck at Home" Design Contest 2021!

name: Pizza de la Olla
description:
Today is your first day of work as a Chef's assistant at “Di Kujen” pizzeria, the busiest pizzeria in town. Things were going great until you accidentally dropped all the ingredients for the pizzas in the big cooking pot. Will you be able to collect the necessary ingredients to prepare the pizzas that the customers ordered?


A game designed in 10 minutes from http://10minutedesignchallenge.co.uk/ and worked on over the course of one night.

name: Magic: The Gathering – Kaladesh Planeswalker Deck: Nissa, Nature's Artisan
description:
Invent Your Tomorrow

Get started playing Magic right away! You'll summon mighty creatures onto the streets of Kaladesh and build reserves of aetheric energy to power them up so they can tear through your enemies' defenses. Call on the power of the Planeswalker Nissa Revane--with a card unique to this deck--to clinch your victory.

Contents:

Ready-to-play 60-card deck including a foil premium Nissa, Nature's Artisan planeswalker card
2 Kaladesh 15-card booster packs
Strategy insert
Magic quick reference card


—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Bag-O-Loot Junior Edition
description:
Bag-O-Loot Junior is a game of set building that can be played by 2-4 players ages 6 and up. The object is to get as many sets of cards in front of you as you can earn points and win the game.

You create sets with matching cards.
yuo can add cards to your sets, and you can take sets from other players. A "Bag-O-Loot" is a set of five matching cards.

The deck consist of 72 cards. Ten of each type of card and two looter cards. You can play a single round which can take between five and fifteen minutes or plays multiple rounds and keep score.

To play with more than four players, just add cards from an addition game. For 5 or 6 players, add half a deck (5 of each tresure card and one additional looter.) For 7 or 8 players, add and entire second deck.

name: 1878: Railways Through the Rocky & Sierra Nevada Mountains
description:
A new 18xx Series Game designed and published by Gary Mroczka located in Southwestern United States.

Game comes with three types of Railroad Corporations, 1) Mining (3 share company, 50% President, two 25% other shares), 2) Short Line (5 share company, 40% President and three 20% shares) and Class 1 (9 share company, 20% President, eight 10% shares).

The game includes a variety of game attributes including mines, tunnels, a golden spike bonus, passenger trains and rolling stock.

Game Contents:
Game Box
Rulebook
Wooden Train Priority Card
Gameboard
Stock Table
18 Charters
28 Mining Railroad Certificates
54 Short Line Railroad Certificates
45 Class 1 Railroad Certificates
15 Private Company Certificates
69 Train Cards
28 Rolling Stock Cards
49 Mining Railroad Tokens
48 Short Line Railroad Tokens
40 Class 1 Railroad Tokens
Loan Tracker Token 
Round Tracker Token
95 Yellow Tiles
60 Green Tiles
44 Brown Tiles
23 Grey Tiles
12 Tunnel Tokens
20 Mine Tokens
3 Private Company Tokens
6 Player Order Cards
mechanics: Network and Route Building, Stock Holding, Tile Placement

name: Meme Stocks
description:
A cool financial game where you don't have to purchase boring stocks and acquire boring loans. You will have to trade the most expensive and important thing that an Internet has - MEMES. You will exchange funny jokes with other players, making hidden bets every turn. Player with the highest value on card takes first meme on table. Player with the second largest - the second meme and so on. If you fulfill condition from exchange card, don't forget to get MEMEBACK. At end of the game the value of all cards except the starting cards, in the hand are calculated. Who has more is the winner.

—description from the publisher

name: The Strange Forgeries Of Mr. S.C.Rheber
description:
The Strange Forgeries Of Mr. S.C. Rheber is a game about forging art using the scientific method.

is a Game Of Induction wherein 2-6 players (the Collectors) will purchase art from their Gallerist trying to fill their museums. However some of the paintings are fakes crafted by the talented forger Simon Charles Rheber. The Collectors will master their inductive reasoning to determine which painting is one of the strange forgeries of Mr. S.C.Rheber.



Official Rules: .PDF

Official Game Master Guide: .PDF

OverviewThe Gallerist invents a secret rule and it’s the Collectors’ objective is to guess it. During the game, the Collectors will produce many Drawings, and the Gallerist will secretly tell them whether it follows the secret rule or not, aka whether the Drawings are Originals or Fakes.
At the end of the game, the Collectors will put their knowledge to the test, and try to guess whether their opponents' displayed Drawings follow the rule or not. Mistakes determine the winner, so they’ll want to try to make as few Mistakes as possible. The Gallerist moderates the game giving out hints as they like.
mechanics: Communication Limits, Highest-Lowest Scoring, Induction, Pattern Building, Pattern Recognition, Targeted Clues

name: Alpine Solitaire
description: Alpine Solitaire is a climbing game for just one player, that can be played with a standard deck of cards. Your goal is to summit a mountaintop by reaching three camps of increasing height, before you are overwhelmed and lose the game. The base game is designed to provide a difficult and replayable experience, but Alpine Solitaire also comes with challenges based around the fourteen "eight-thousander" mountains, which alter the base rules of the game in a number of ways.
mechanics: Hand Management, Ladder Climbing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Spitze Skizze
description:
Over multiple rounds in Spitze Skizze, you and your fellow players need to figure out how to match the image of a person on a hidden card.

In more detail, one player looks at the figure on a card, while everyone else draws and deduces. In the first round, you draw a stick figure paying attention to four traits: whether the eyes are open or closed, where the arms are, where the legs are, and how the body is shaped. The critic looking at the card writes down how many of these traits you have correct, then you draw another figure, after which the critic again identifies the number of correct traits.

How quickly can you draw the correct figure?

name: Cosmic Chains
description:
In Cosmic Chains, a competitive dueling card game, two players build satellite chains in space to provide the best Internet connection for planet Earth. The longer the chain is, the faster people can load their favorite websites.

Both players have identical decks (but with different characters!) and only one action to spend on each turn. They can launch satellites, swap them with one another to move them around the looped chain, and use their special effects to outsmart the opponent or destroy their satellites and break their chain. The competition is real, so do whatever it takes to make your chain the longest!

At the end of the game, players get 1 Victory Point for each connected satellite in their chain. If the chain was coldheartedly broken (space is tough, so it will definitely happen), players count satellites in its longest segment. The player with the most Victory Points survives the battle in orbit and wins the game.

Cosmic Chains also has two additional modes: Superpowers with asymmetrical starting positions, and Space Debris — additional ways to get VPs at the end of the game and gain more actions per turn.

—description from the publisher

name: Battle of Bomoh
description:
Objective of the game is to eliminate all the Bomohs and be the last Bomoh standing



Playstyle is to draw a card and play 2 action cards accordingly.



Player can play these cards and counter each other out (Ghouls, Talisman, Hex, Summoner), During the game, players may draw divine beings to counter plague cards(Disaster cards). If player fails to counter plague card, they will be eliminated from the game. Last player standings wins.


—user summary

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS ABOUT SHAMANS:

1) Is BOMOH based on a true story?
Nope. All characters and characters are purely fictional.

2) How many people can participate in playing BOMOH?
2-5 players (those aged 18 and over).

3) How long does it take to play BOMOH?
Only 15 minutes to 25 minutes for one round.

—description from the publisher (translated)

SOALAN LAZIM MENGENAI BOMOH:

1) Adakah BOMOH berdasarkan kisah sebenar?
Tidak. Semua watak dan karakter adalah rekaan semata-mata.

2) Berapa orang boleh turut serta bermain BOMOH?
2-5 orang pemain (yang berumur 18 tahun ke atas).

3) Berapa tempoh waktu diperlukan untuk bermain BOMOH?
Hanya 15 minit ke 25 minit sahaja untuk satu pusingan.

—description from the publisher

name: The Pickleball Card Game
description:
The Pickleball Card Game is played with 2 teams as singles or doubles, 1 or 2 players on each team. Your offensive and defensive skills are constantly challenged and changing throughout this fast-paced game, that involves a combination of skill, strategy and luck.

Teams compete to be the first to score 11 points by collecting sets and runs of cards to get a complete hand. You can only score when you have control of the serve though so be sure to stop your opponent from getting on a service run.

name: Free the Dinosaurs
description:
An evil scientist has captured 15 different dinosaurs and is holding them in a "paddock" fenced area for his studies. The players are trying to rescue and free the dinosaurs. The game background story says this occurs on a large island near the US. There is no further reference to a well known movie with a somewhat similar dinosaur park theme.

Each person, in turn, plays card(s) to free the dinos from the paddock; or can play cards to take a dino from another player; or can build up their hand of cards to use on a future turn. Players also interact by trying to play the highest value card when a dino card is played which is marked with a less than symbol at the top. (Somewhat the reverse of actual game play which is to place a greater number than the other players.)

The game can be played using either one of two ending victory conditions: A) be the first player to release 5 dinos, or B) have freed the most dinosaurs when the game ends... after the last dino is freed from the "paddock" area.

The publisher especially intends for this to be an educational game for kids to learn more about these dinos, and to use some basic math.

name: Don't Feed the Troll
description:
Don't Feed the Troll, the game of discord! Does the internet mean anything to you? This endless web where trolls, haters and mini vigilantes abound? This strange place where wars and melodramas take place, conspiracy theories and fights with hateful comments. But if, you see, those endless discussions messing up your Facebook news feed...

With Arkham Society, our brand new publishing house, we thought of making a game of atmosphere and strategy that will make you lose all your friends during the game. (Wrong. He was a Troll).

In truth, it's a funny game on the quirks of the interweb that will liven up your best parties and in which you can challenge your worst friends!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Video Game Theme

name: Magic: The Gathering – Kaladesh Planeswalker Deck: Chandra, Pyrogenius
description:
Invent Your Tomorrow

Get started playing Magic right away! You'll fly rings around the dizzying spires of Kaladesh in airships and other magically powered vehicles, raining down fire upon your enemies as they struggle to fight back. Summon the Planeswalker Chandra Nalaar--with a card unique to this deck--to clinch your victory.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Tankestreger
description:
A drawing game, where everyone is playing at the same time either as the one who should guess the word or as drawer.
The faster the word is guessed, the more point you score.

name: From Beyond the Grave
description:
From beyond the Grave is a Roll and Write, Print and Play Single Player adventure that plays in 15-30 minutes.

The city of Nilam hides a grotesque secret that dates back to the construction of the Cathedral. On an ominous day in December 1819, someone broke the seal that prevented the souls of the slaughtered from pouring into the city. Since that day, corruption of the flesh, depravity and vengeance have run rampant in the streets.

You wear the cloak of one of the Saviors, special members of the High Council, and your task is to unveil the mystery and put an end to the horrors.

Choose one of four characters with special abilities. Then you take the first of three districts maps and start your quest. The story is divided into six chapters with three different tasks that you have to fulifill in order to advance. At the beginning of your turn, roll 2 dice. Pick one die and move of a number of spots up to the obtained result.
The unused die can be saved for later in your Character Card.
When you step on specific spots on the map, you can perform different actions, such as fight, heal, shop or discover mysteries that bring the story forward.

You win by completing all tasks and lose when you get killed by the Horrors or time runs out!

Save Nilam. Save its citizens. Save yourself from the curse.

—description from the designer

name: BOMB24
description:
24 hours left until the bomb explodes. Escape from the bomb in a limited amount of time! Extend your time and extend your life!
Advance the time and fall into the opponent! Your choice divides your destiny!

In the play time about 15 minutes, make full use of your intuition and time tactics! Grab the victory!

A BOMB card or SAFE card will be dealt at the beginning of the game.

Defeated if you have a BOMB card when you reach 24 counts. Winner if you have a SAFE card!

You can raise or lower the count with the plus card and a minus card!

name: Pret in het circus
description:
Take turns to add an acrobat to the human pyramid. The first player who succesfully adds all six acrobats wins.

An element of randomness is added by spinning a wheel each turn to determine conditions for adding an acrobat.

name: Nainporte Quoi!
description: Test your deduction skills in this wacky riddle game! Observe the illustrations and be the first player to grab the rubber dwarf to give the word that starts with UN NAIN... If no one finds the word, you are entitled to a clue. The team or player who finishes the game with the highest score wins the game!

name: Vecinos inesperados: Relatos de la fauna silvestre en Bogotá
description:
Card game associated with the production of the book and documentary film of the same name.
The game seeks to publicize the zoological diversity present in Bogotá city through photographs and biological data of various species.
On each turn, each player must take the top card from their deck. The player in turn must select a characteristic of the card he took, and bet against the other players if his card has a higher or lower value than those of the other players. The player who best meets the condition keeps all the cards played in the round. The player who manages to make at least 22 cards wins.

name: Magic: The Gathering – Core Set 2021 Planeswalker Deck: Liliana, Death Mage
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Freed from her previous burdens, Liliana is prepared to take what is rightfully hers. In this case, it's your complete and utter victory fueled by a highly disposable army of the undead.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Оранж Квест: Атака Роботов (Orange Quest: Robot Attack)
description: It so happened that there are no former candy thieves. Joe took up the old one again, but decided to cover the tracks properly. And this means that 8 new areas are waiting for the players. Intuition tells us that the main villain must be hiding in a candy factory. However, there is still a depot, a ship and a crow's nest, where you can quietly peck at candy. Although it is possible that Joe hid in the observatory. He sits to himself, pops sweets all day and looks at the stars, thinking about how they look like lollipops. And in general, who knows him. These thugs are so unpredictable. Will Joe suddenly want to spend the rest of his life in a cabin in the woods weaving looted candy and singing heartwarming songs about an old maple tree?
categories: Adventure, Card Game, Fantasy, Humor, Party Game

name: Sticky 10
description:
Sticky 10 is a fun card game that can be played with 2-8 players.

Players will try different strategies to win the game while trying to get rid of Sticky 10 cards that cannot be played.

Setup


Players pick one random card from color cards. All players take one Sticky 10 card to their hand. Keep remaining Sticky 10 cards out of the game


For 2 players game, add 2 extra Sticky 10 card into the deck and mix it

For 3 players game, add 1 extra Sticky 10 card into the deck and mix it


There are 4 Terminator cards in the game. But, in the games played up to with 4 players, only 2 Terminator cards are added into the deck whereas 4 Terminator cards are added into the deck in the games 5-8 players. Keep remaining Terminator cards out of the game
All players are distributed 9 cards. Thus players shall have 10 cards at the beginning of the game, including Sticky 10 card.
The deck is put on the table face down. A card is opened from the top. The game begins!


Note: If the card opened from the top is a Special card or Sticky 10 card, players may begin to play by throwing any card with any color to the table.

How to play?


The youngest player begins to play first and the sequence continues by counter clock wise. Each player can play only one card on their turn.
Each player can play only one card on their turn.
The player who shall begin to play, plays according to the open card on the table.


For instance: There is "red 2" card on the table. The player who should play can do one of the following moves;


Plays with any red; it is going to be the next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have remained same.



Plays any card which matches with any number and color on the table; he/she gives to the next player any two cards from his/her hand and it is going to be next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have remained same.


• Plays any card which matches with the number on the table; he/she gives to the next player any one card from his/her hand and it is going to be next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have changed. Next player should throw a card according to the new color. You can also throw different color but same number or Special card.

• Plays any Special cards; card's feature shall be active and it is either going to be the next player's turn to play according to the card thrown, or not. In such a case, the player who should play shall determine the color by the card he is going to throw.

Note: If you can not throw any card, draw a new card from deck. If you still can not throw any card, your turn ends.

The player who removed his cards first from his hand shall be deemed to have won.

name: Wits & Wagers: Las Vegas, Baby! – Expansión: Campeones del Mundo
description:
The World Cup euphoria cannot be contained, so we had to make this mini expansion to celebrate the Scaloneta cup. How much do you remember those beautiful days in Qatar?

Suggested pairing for this expansion: a good fernet.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game, Print & Play, Trivia

name: Speedway Gala
description:
Simple roll & move game from Poland about motorcycle speedway racing.
While the game itself is very basic, it puts a lot of effort into realism, offering an option of chaining a number of games into individual or team championships, with scorepads for keeping track as in a real-life speedway league.

name: Dinosaur Game
description:
Dinosaur Grześ loses ground under his feet. Whoever causes the fall loses! Carefully knock out the stones and try not to be the person who will cause this unfortunate event and save him from trouble.

How to play?

Spin the arrow and use the hammer to knock out the stone (or two or three) it points out. The player who causes the dinosaur to completely lose its balance loses… and must clean up. But he can also demand a rematch!

The game develops motor skills and logical thinking in the youngest players.

—description from the publisher

Dinosaur Game reimplements Penguin Trap, which has the same cubes (now called stones) and hammers, but different animal and different spinner. Apart from obvious thematic difference, there is a difference in mechanics, because in Dinosaur Game the spinner allows to knock 1, 2 or 3 stones, which makes the game much faster and more dynamic.

—user summary

name: You're An Idiot...and your friends are, too
description:
No one is safe from judgment (including you) in this fast paced, easy-to-learn card game, which features you and your friends! How to play: Appoint one player as the judge. The judge spins the spinner, which then points to an Idiot at the table. The judge plays a card about said Idiot, and the rest of the players play a card from their hand to complete the sentence. The judge reads the card combinations aloud with the Idiot's name and chooses the best one to win the point. But before any cards are played, the Idiot spinner can give the judge the power to mix up everyone's cards. It's time for game night for Idiots everywhere!

—description from the publisher

name: Dubienka, Zieleńce 1792
description:
Battles of Zieleńce and Dubienka, fought in 1792 are the famous battles of the Polish history. Both took place during the war of Polish consitution against Russia.

In the battle of Zieleńce (18.6.1792) newly formed Polsh army led by general Józef Zajączek, succesfully stood against stronger and much more experienced Russian army. Russians suffered twice as much losses as Poles and had to retreat.

In the battle of Dubienka (18.7.1792) Polish troops led by general Thadeus Kościuszku fought an all day battle against Russians in the fortified positions. Despite the fact that Poles eventually left their positions, Russians suffered huge losses (about 4000 dead and wounded), while Polish army suffered smaller losses (about 900) and was still able to fight.

Game depicts both battles, along with hypothetical variants, showing "what if" situations.

Scenario list:
Zieleńce (historical scenario)
Zieleńce 2 (hypothetical scenario)
Dubienka (historical scenario)
mechanics: Hexagon Grid, Turn Order: Role Order

name: ワケアリガールコレクション (Wakeari Girls Collection)
description: You have died and been reincarnated into a video game called Love Period—only, Love Period happens to be notorious for the slogan "get too close to the heroine and you will certainly meet your death". In this bluffing card game, your aim is to direct the attention of the Love Period characters away from yourself and onto other players. Lay any number of cards from your hand facedown in front of another player and name a character. The other player either accepts your statement or calls your bluff. If they were wrong, attention is directed towards them, so they place the cards in front of them. If they were correct, attention is drawn back to you instead, and you take the cards. The other player may also choose to pass on the cards to a third player instead, but they must first turn one of them faceup, keeping it beside them; if it matches any cards they've previously flipped from passing on prior turns, they must place all those cards in front of them. Gain too many cards of any one character and you die, losing the game while everyone else wins. However, if all players happen to survive by the time the deck runs out, the player who gained the most cards wins.
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Deduction, Horror, Party Game, Video Game Theme
mechanics: Hand Management, Hot Potato, Set Collection, Single Loser Game, Sudden Death Ending, Take That

name: Crimson Skies: The Hollywood Knights Squadron Pack
description:
A set of four aircraft miniatures for the Crimson Skies base game's aerial dogfight rules. The pack includes two Bloodhawk miniatures (aircraft #5 and #6) and two Firebrand miniatures (aircraft #7 and #8).
All four miniatures are painted in a style common to the squadron with different details on each type of plane.
categories: Aviation / Flight, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures

name: Crimson Skies: The Red Skull Legion Squadron Pack
description:
A set of four aircraft miniatures for the Crimson Skies base game's aerial dogfight rules. The pack includes two Peacemaker 370 miniatures (aircraft #17 and #18) and two Firebrand miniatures (aircraft #19 and #20).
All four miniatures are painted in a style common to the squadron with different details on each type of plane.
categories: Aviation / Flight, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures

name: Crimson Skies: Ace Pack #3 – Aces Wild
description:
A set of two aircraft miniatures for the Crimson Skies base game's aerial dogfight rules plus two pilot miniatures for the base game's personal combat rules. The pack includes one S2B Kestral aircraft miniature (aircraft #21), one Peacemaker 370 aircraft miniature (aircraft #22), pilot miniature Jonathan "Ghengis" Khan (pilot #5), and pilot miniature Louis "Wild Card" Thibodeaux (pilot #6).

The two aircraft miniatures are painted in a style common to their squadrons.

Also includes a pack of Navigation Cards.
categories: Aviation / Flight, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures

name: Lumeria: Grecy vs Rzymianie
description:
They say faith works miracles, but that's not true. The gods work miracles, and faith strengthens their power. However, when the ancient peoples die out, and the gods are worshiped by a smaller and smaller group of worshipers, their power decreases. So they set off - one by one - in search of new acolytes, and their eyes turn to the shores of Lumeria...

Lumeria is a battle card game, and Greeks vs Romans is one of the core sets for the game. Players take on the role of gods known from various mythologies and lead their armies while competing with the enemy on the battlefield. The aim of the game is to score the appropriate number of points for controlling the targets marked on the board. During the game, players move cards representing specific units on a grid of fields, clashing with the enemy army in a dynamic skirmish. The faction decks available in the game represent various civilizations known from the rich mythologies of polytheistic cults. Players will have to manage their units by performing a variety of actions that allow them to maneuver around the battlefield and harass the enemy. The constant economy system not only ensures a balanced gameplay, but also allows you to fix some decisions, making the gameplay more engaging. A wide range of special abilities of units and powerful gods create an amazing combination, allowing you to make bold plays on the battlefield and win glory for your faction!
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Lumeria: Słowianie vs Wikingowie
description:
They say faith works miracles, but that's not true. The gods work miracles, and faith strengthens their power. However, when the ancient peoples die out, and the gods are worshiped by a smaller and smaller group of worshipers, their power decreases. So they set off - one by one - in search of new acolytes, and their eyes turn to the shores of Lumeria...

Lumeria is a battle card game, and Slavs vs Vikings is one of the core sets for the game.

Players take on the role of gods known from various mythologies and lead their armies while competing with the enemy on the battlefield. The aim of the game is to score the appropriate number of points for controlling the targets marked on the board. During the game, players move cards representing specific units on a grid of fields, clashing with the enemy army in a dynamic skirmish. The faction decks available in the game represent various civilizations known from the rich mythologies of polytheistic cults. Players will have to manage their units by performing a variety of actions that allow them to maneuver around the battlefield and harass the enemy. The constant economy system not only ensures a balanced gameplay, but also allows you to fix some decisions, making the gameplay more engaging. A wide range of special abilities of units and powerful gods create an amazing combination, allowing you to make bold plays on the battlefield and win glory for your faction!
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: ドミノプラントカンパニー (Domino Plant Company)
description: A domino action game where you earn points by defeating plants planted in the forest with a special hammer and delivering them! However, if you knock down too many dominoes, you'll be forced to retire!? Determine your limits and plant plants where other players can't touch!

name: Cargo Barjo
description:
"Stay on board!"

A dexterity game where players take turns loading plastic "stuff" onto a swaying cargo ship. Each player has seven containers and two barrels, one normal and one "explosive/radioactive" (twice as heavy), and a spinner determines what needs to be loaded on each player's turn. Containers must be loaded by a loading fork and must always touch previously placed containers from the same player, while barrels can be more freely placed by hand to either balance the ship or to make it trickier for the next player to load their cargo. Matters are further complicated by a pesky pelican who thinks that "Le Barjo" is simply the best perching point in the whole harbour, and always insist on sitting at the highest point of the boat.

Tipping cargo overboard is bad as you get all of your own tipped cargo back, while any other players' pieces are out of the game, making it easier for them; the first one to get rid of all their cargo wins.

Similar to:


Riff Raff
categories: Action / Dexterity, Children's Game, Nautical, Party Game, Transportation

name: Steig ein!
description:
Steig ein! is a simple game of dice in which 2 to 4 players try to get their playing pieces from their home bases into buses.

The board depicts a circle of 48 playing fields encircling a wheel with 4 buses. The buses each offer 4 seats, a door field and a door step. In each corner of the board is a home base where the four pieces of each player start.

The players take their turn by rolling the dice and moving any one of their pieces either over the 48 playing fields or into a bus. On the surrounding playing fields, there is no limit to the number of pieces on a field. Inside the buses, only one piece per field is allowed. On the door field and the door step, players can be captured and returned to their base.

If a player rolls a 6, they may not move a piece but has to roll again. The wheel is then turned clockwise the respective number of fields of the second roll. If the roll is a 6 again the wheel is turned 6 fields and the dice is rolled again and the wheel turned again.

The first player to move all four pieces into a seat of any bus wins the game.

—user summary

name: Dragon Times
description: Dragon Times is an adventure, fantasy card game suitable for ages 6 and up. The game helps children practice and memorize multiplication facts in a fun and exciting way. It includes 42 dragon cards, 54 spell cards, a spell book, an instruction manual, and a spinner. Children learn about factors, multiples, and division while saving and taming Dragons and restoring peace in a magical land. Choose the correct spells to save the Dragons of Times and set them free with the magic spinner.

name: 美術大戦〜モナリザVS牛乳を注ぐ女VSサトゥルヌス (Art War: Mona Lisa VS Milk Maid VS Saturnus)
description:
Art War ~ Mona Lisa VS Milkmaid VS Saturnus is a curating card battle where you fight magically remodeled masterpieces to compete for paintings and create the strongest museum.

Each player combines eight decks with the theme of eight different masterpieces, and uses the effects of the cards to attract visitors to the museum. The player who can attract the most people to the museum can acquire the museum, the paintings displayed in it, and add the paintings to their own gallery.

name: Late Night Stories
description: Players use a collection of unrelated items contributed by other players, and weave them into a story. Each story is scored by the other players, who contribute a voting card with a number of points and an "accolade" or mini-review. After a predetermined number of rounds, the storyteller with the most points wins.

name: Escape from the Gingerbread House
description:
It's Christmas Eve. You're way too excited to sleep. Creeping downstairs for a late-night snack you find a mysterious gingerbread house and just can't resist taking a huge bite. But before you know it you've shrunk to the size of an ant and are trapped inside! While the delicious sights and smells are enough to make your mouth water, you only have one hour to make your escape before you're trapped in there forever!

Solve each of the four puzzles to work out which one of the 12 different gingerbread men you need to eat to unshrink yourself. Only by solving the puzzles correctly will you be able to safely make your escape and be back in time for Christmas morning.

--description from publisher's website
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Star Intruders
description:
"The invaders are atting the planet!
An evil army from outer space decided to destroy the Earth by attacking its great capital cities. Thankfully, the Earth has ace pilots who, thanks to their proton turrets, will try to put an end to the invasion... and possibly to destroy the enemy for good.
You are one of these pilots. Take place in your cockpit and prepare to become a legend!"

This game belongs to the Cosmo Duck Roll & Write Collection.

Players each play a spaceship trying to ward off aliens represented by five rows of little spaceships, each with a unique pair of dice faces above them. Each turn, the starting player will throw 4 dice and will pair them two-by-two as they like. For both pair of dice obtained, they can destroy the alien spaceship linked to that dice combination.

It a full row of ships has been destroyed, the player crosses it - it will gain them additional points at the end of the game.

Once a full colums has been destroyed, the player can take on the Mothership. This Mothership has 6 dices attributed to it, and the player must take 3 shots in total to destroy it (each shot crossing two of the dice next to it).

Once a player destroyed the Mothership, all player tally their scores. They add up the scores attributed to all the spaceship they destroyed (the ones with harder combination are worth more points, and they are color-coded) to the score of the rows they cleared. The player with the most points wins!

name: COPET
description:
At the stardust festival on the planet Ultia, sweet pieces of stardust called Copets rain down. If you collect or eat Copets according to your fortune, you are promised happiness in the coming year. Greedy princes want all the happiness for themselves! Of the three brothers, who will be the happiest prince･･･!?

COPET (コペット) is a set collection game for three players. The box acts as the randomizer, having small holes in the sides of the top and bottom that can align to allow players to shake out small plastic red, blue, yellow, and white pieces. The pieces resemble konpeitō, brightly colored Japanese sugar candy.

On a player's turn, they may choose to collect a Copet, consume a Copet by placing it on their Tummy Tracker, or draw an Astrology Card. After they've consumed certain amounts of Copets, they may also switch a Copet with another player or place one of their Copets on anoter player's Tummy Tracker. Collecting a white Copet allows a player to draw and reveal a special White Astrology Card.

When the box is emptied of Copets, players reveal their cards and score points according to the Copets and Astrology Cards they've collected. For instance a player might score 2 points if they have 2 red Copets on their Tummy Tracker, or they might score 5 points because the player to their right consumed 2 blue Copets.

name: Age of Arms
description:
The Middle Ages. Despite the severe restrictions on movement during this period, there were still those who traded. The lords with their intricate fiefdoms and the rise of the City relies on these traders. You are a major distributor across Central Europe... But you don't yet have the trading posts to support your commerce. Scavenge for materials, fulfil contracts and venture out into the outside world. Lead the youth of the Family in building up a network of trading posts and trading houses from village to village and town to town.

Age of Arms is a middle-weight euro game that combines resource management, building, and board movement. The game has two pillars.

The first is to collect a tableau of cards to fulfil contracts. The cards you collect are also resources for fulfilling additional contracts. By accumulating cards of the same colour, special effects can be obtained and the game is accelerated. The completed contract cards also dictate which direction and how far you can move.

The second pillar is the 'Traders Journey'. By utilising the movement dictated by your contracts, the players trade caravan travels around the 12 cities of Central Europe. Along the way, you can set up trading posts, build trading houses and score points in the cities.

Which of the trading companies will befriend the most noblemen and become the champions of the age?
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Contracts, Point to Point Movement
publishers: Southern Cross Games (サザンクロスゲームズ)

name: HacKClad: CROSS FATE
description:
A new threat, the "Shell-Type Clad", attacks the last city of humanity, Encratia.
Witches of unknown affiliation appeared in response to Clad's invasion.
Those who desire the destruction of the world. resister. and a watcher.
As the battle rages on, destinies intertwine.

name: Truth Serum: Truth or Dare
description:
Put your dignity aside for in this outrageous party game of hilarious dares and terrible truths.
Win cards by tackling your choice of truth or dare. Your fellow players will judge whether or not your completed truth or dare was satisfactory!

Answer truthfully enough and you will be awarded the card – hold back and your card will be withheld. Or take a dare and get ready to do something outrageous in the pursuit of victory!

Whichever players wins five truth or dare cards is the champion.

name: Banderea
description:
With Banderea, discover the flags of the world, the capital, population and dimension of the countries, as well as the continent in which they are located. All while having fun and challenging your friends. 6 different game modes that require speed, visual perception, attention and memory.

How to play:

Step 1: All cards with the red border are randomly placed on the table, flag side up.

Step 2: One player rolls the 2 blue dice; these indicate a single letter.

Step 3: The first player to put a finger on that card wins the card!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Con Banderea, descubre las banderas del mundo, la capital, población y dimensión de los países, así como el continente en el que se encuentran. Todo mientras te diviertes y desafías a tus amigos. 6 modos de juego diferentes que requieren velocidad, percepción visual, atención y memoria.

Como se juega:

Paso 1: Se colocan al azar sobre la mesa todas las cartas del borde rojo, con la cara de la bandera hacia arriba.

Paso 2: Un jugador tira los 2 dados azules; estos indican una única carta.

Paso 3: El primer jugador en poner un dedo en esa carta, gana la carta!

—description from the publisher

name: Gatefall: Monsters
description:
Gatefall: Monsters is an expansion to the Gatefall Universes and includes a stylized take on classic monsters. Each fighter brings new abilities to the game.

The Monsters base set includes The Monster, The Mummy, and Dracula.
categories: Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Horror, Miniatures, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Action Queue, Deck Construction, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement

name: Galactic Tactics
description:
The Vornox and the Mylikar were once allied races. Their ties forged through the ages by cooperation and trade. That peaceful period of time, now known as the Age of Light, is barely a distant memory to the now warring nations. No one knows exactly where the line was drawn between these former allies, but the carnage that followed is now etched in stone, and continues to this day.

In Galactic Tactics players take on the role of two warring alien races. Players move around the game board using four unique ship types that the players drafted at the beginning of the game. Each ship offers a tactical movement sequence that can eventually score victory points by landing on one of three enemy planets, thus earning victory points.
