Wcielacie się w postać Spy Guya – superdetektywa, który strzeże prawa i porządku w Treflikowie. Waszym zadaniem jest złapanie Berta, zanim ten dotrze do swojej maszyny i za jej pomocą ukradnie z miasta wszystkie bombki! Jeśli zdołacie go dogonić – wygrywacie!

By złapać Berta, razem ze Spy Guyem musicie odnaleźć jak najwięcej poszlak poukrywanych w całym mieście. Im więcej
ich odnajdziecie, tym szybciej Wasz pionek dogoni ciekającego
Berta. Przedmioty, które musicie odnaleźć, umieszczone zostały na kartach poszlak.

Spy Guy Zimowa Przygoda jest grą kooperacyjną, w której wszyscy kierujecie ruchami detektywa. Rozgrywka składa się z serii naprzemiennie występujących po sobie tur Spy Guya i Berta.Grę rozpoczyna Spy Guy.

W turze Szpiega:

Odsłońcie z talii jedną kartę poszlak. Wskazuje ona przedmiot, którego w tej turze musicie poszukać na planszy.
Od razu po odkryciu karty obróćcie klepsydrę.
Wszyscy wypatrujecie na planszy poszukiwanego przedmiotu.


Będzie występował w więcej niż jednym miejscu. Jeżeli któremuś z Was uda się go wypatrzyć, kładzie na nim znacznik poszlak.

Gdy piasek w klepsydrze się przesypie, poszukiwania się kończą! Nie możecie już dokładać kolejnych znaczników.
Policzcie, ile poszukiwanych przedmiotów udało się Wam znaleźć.Przesuńcie pionek Spy Guya o tyle samo


pól w kierunku Berta. Zdejmijcie wszystkie znaczniki poszlak
z planszy. Jeśli Spy Guy nie dogonił lub nie przegonił Berta, rozegrajcie turę Berta.

W turze Berta spójrzcie na odkrytą w turze Spy Guya kartę
poszlak. Przesuńcie Berta o tyle pól do przodu (w stronę maszyny), ile śladów butów widnieje na karcie. Następnie, jeśli Bert nie dotarł jeszcze do swojej maszyny, rozpocznijcie kolejną turę Spy Guya.

Jeśli Bert dojdzie do ostatniego pola na planszy, kradnie wszystkie bombki z Treflikowa! Niestety przegrywacie. Jeśli Spy Guy zdoła dogonić lub przegonić Berta w jego drodze
ku maszynie, udało Wam się go złapać i wygrywacie!

—description from the publisher (Polish)

name: Ratyl
description:
Welcome to planet Ratyl.
Thousands of years after humans abandon an exhausted trade planet, rats now thrive. Centuries of progress sees significant technology and cultural advancements, however rat identity continues to clash with the previous human influence.
A toxic but necessary monarchy of cats surface to keep rat numbers under control and protect the civilisation known as Ratyl. With the rat community becoming too advanced; King Apollyn bans all human culture and bi-pedal affections. A resistance of outlaws form an uprising to regain control of their planet with a desire for knowledge of the humanoid past.

Ratyl is a dexterity/strategy mini game console for up to two players lasting 20-40 minutes. It's the cornhole/X-com/warioware crossover everyone has been asking for...

Ratyl is perfect to play solo or with a friend. It's incredibly snappy while creating countless 'oh my gosh!' moments of success and failure. Easily thrown in a bag at around the size of a VHS case.

The meaty dexterity layer will have you tossing, placing and moving diamonds that satisfyingly (I mean like really satisfying) rattle into a 5x10 grid. There are twenty mini games from super cozy to super crunchy. Can you escape the room as an assassin, build a successful veggie crop or invade your opponents castle?

A layer of strategy has you drafting a hand of outlaw rats that allow you to alter the game state with various powers. Rewind an action, steal an outlaw card or move a diamond at will to name a few.

Finally place the powerful polyomino pieces to persuade the diamonds to fall in your favour and increase your chances of dextrous success.

Ratyl is a competitive mini game console that is continually evolving with it’s own community. 'Plug in’ the twenty different solo and two player mini games included to enjoy a variety of mechanics and ideas designed to spark your imagination.

Have a great idea for a mini game? Then join our community online. Share scores, stories and download an endless number of new games and mechanics. Support each other as you help create new game ideas for the ever evolving game system.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Action Drafting, Grid Movement, Hand Management, Modular Board, Open Drafting, Roll / Spin and Move, Take That, Three Dimensional Movement

name: CoOperate
description:
Cooperate is an all-or-nothing team game in which you must predict - in 30 brief Seconds – how many words your team will shout out that meet the Cooperate card challenge. A soon as you have predicted your score turn the timer again and you’re off for another 30 seconds to actually shout out the predicted Number of words – but if you don’t reach that number you score Nothing.

—description from the publisher

name: King of Glory: The Card Game
description:
King of Glory: The Card Game consists of a 54 card deck, with each card numbered 1-54. Each card depicts a different scene from the book, KING of GLORY. In the game you are attempting to play cards sequentially and make connections between cards to score points.

On your turn draw 2 cards either from the top of the deck or the discard area. You may then play either both cards, one of the cards, or none of the cards. Each card you play will score 1 point at the end of the game. So why wouldn't you always play both cards you might ask?

Because the one rule when playing cards is the card must be lower than all your previously played cards, or higher than all of them. It can't be between any of them.

There is one exception. If a card you want to play has a symbol on it that matches a symbol on a card you've already played, you may ignore the one placement rule. Simply place the card in your played cards row so that all your cards remain in ascending order. At the end of the game you get 2 points for each symbol match.

The game is based on the book KING of GLORY. You do not need to be familiar with the book to play the game, but those that are will enjoy identifying the thematic symbol connections between different cards.

name: Scale Up!
description:
Start as Entrepreneurs. Earn money, hire staff, and expand to new locations to win the game!
Scale Up! is about the ups and downs of building your own business, from an Entrepreneur all the way to an Empire!
There aren't any overnight successes here, so start small and build your way to the top! Compete against other players to build the biggest business at the table. Are you ready to Scale Up!?

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Bids As Wagers, Catch the Leader, Dice Rolling, Events, Income, Ownership, Take That

name: GAMI
description:
Object of the Game

To collect as many cards as possible by forming GAMIs

Starting the Game

Gami is a game for 2 players, played with one pack of cards, but only Aces and cards from 2 to 8 are included, from three suits only - Clubs, Diamonds, and Hearts. Spades are not included, meaning the game is played with a total of 24 cards.

Initially, each player is dealt nine cards, the remaining six cards are left on the table. All cards are turned face up.

Playing the Game

In each turn, each player exchanges one card from his or her hand, with one of the six cards placed on the table. The valid exchanges are limited - the exchange rules section below describes the valid combinations. A player who is unable to make a valid exchange loses the game.

If the newly picked up card together with any other two cards in the player's hand completes a GAMI (see below), the player can take any one card from his or her opponent's hand, meaning he or she gets one card more, while the opponent gets one card less.

Only the card picked up during an exchange can form a GAMI. An existing combination of cards in the hand does not constitute a GAMI, although the player can use it to make one by exchanging one of the three cards, then picking it up again during the next turn (assuming that the opponent does not pick that card during his or her turn). The card captured from the opponent's hand after a GAMI is formed does not constitute a new GAMI and does not grant an additional capture.

The rule above applies to the initial nine cards as well - even if a player is dealt a valid GAMI combination, he or she is not eligible to capturing any cards.

A player who is reduced to two cards loses the game, as he or she is no longer able to complete a GAMI. Similarly, a player who is unable to make a valid exchange loses the game.

Exchange rules

Any card can be exchanged for an adjacent card of the same suits. Adjacent cards are cards whose value differs by 1, the value of Aces is considered to be 1. Additionally, Eights and Aces can be exchanged. For example, a Three of Hearts can be exchanged for either a Two of Hearts or a Four of Hearts. An Eight of Diamonds can be exchanged for a Seven of Diamonds or an Ace of Diamonds.

In addition to the above option, even-numbered cards can be swapped for a card of suits of a different color and the same value. For example, a Four of Clubs can be swapped for a Four of Diamonds or a Four of Hearts, in addition to Three of Clubs and Five of Clubs from the first rule. A Six of Diamonds can be exchanged for a Six of Clubs, but not a Six of Hearts, as they both have the same color.
GAMI

A GAMI is one of the following combinations (in any order):
Ace + Two + Three of any single suit
Three + Four + Five of any single suit
Five + Six + Seven of any single suit
Seven + Eight + Ace of any single suit
Twos of Hearts + Diamonds + Clubs
Fours of Hearts + Diamonds + Clubs
Sixes of Hearts + Diamonds + Clubs
Eights of Hearts + Diamonds + Clubs

name: DAK Attack
description:
DAK Attack represents incidents the Long Range Desert Group (LRDG) face on return journeys from Road Watch or Raid missions in North Africa during the Second World War. As a player in this primary solo game you are in command of one of the LRDG elite patrols, making tactical decisions to try and destroy as many enemy assets as possible on your return to base, whilst ensuring the safety of your men and vehicles.

DAK Attack is a set of miniature rules for the tactical and encounters as well as the campaign game.
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Set-up

name: Express Baseball Scout Tour
description:
In Express Baseball Scout Tour, the players take on the role of being baseball scouts, touring Japan looking for the best high school talents, but also picking up tips on players already at the professional level.

Each round, a player rolls a die, and the players decide how they will move: car, train, or plane. They draw on a central map their movement, visiting different players, and recording it on their memo sheet. Most players only play one position, some players aren't available to scouts every round, etc.

Periodically, there are scorings for who has scouted the most professional players, the first one to scout at least one player at each position, etc.

The player with the most points at the end of nine rounds wins.

name: Rookie
description:
A colorful party game with funny and surprising situations. Rookie is quick and easy to explain. It can be played in different modes and remains exciting until the end. It is suitable for two to six people from 6 years old. The workmanship is of high quality, as is the graphic design with a reduced, clear language of color and form.

This colorful generation game can be played in three different variations and levels of difficulty. The winner is the person who manages to uncover and then secure the most cards in pairs. Teams can also score points here - it's just a matter of drawing the right colors and remembering the colors and positions of all the cards. All well and good - if it weren't for that darn "X"! The "X" acts as a game changer and allows opponents to pick off unsecured pairs! ROOKIE - Everything else is for beginners!

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: H.D.P.: Los Más Tiranos
description: Micro expansion with 9 (1 black + 8 white) new cards.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Chomp: Flyers & Scavengers
description:
The Flyers & Scavengers expansion brings you eight new cards, giving secret goals for each player to complete! Maybe you must keep all your dinos alive, maybe they all need to be extinct, or perhaps, something else! This is a great twist to keep the game fresh for repeated plays.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Open Drafting, Pattern Building, Tile Placement

name: Predators and Prey
description:
Get ready for some wild fun in Predators & Prey! There are two parts to the game. First, in the Capture Phase, you try to get the coolest animals and make them stronger. Then comes the Battle Phase, where you use smart moves to fight against others and see who's the last animal standing. The game is super funny and exciting, and even though it's silly, you can use sneaky tricks and smart strategies to win!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action/Event, Hand Management, Player Elimination, Tile Placement

name: Μαγνητικό Ποδόσφαιρο (Magnetic Football)
description: Each player takes 11 pawns of his color and distributes them to the magnetic board in some specific spaces. Players take turns, moving their pawns according to the rules, trying to kick their opponent's pawn outside the board.

name: Escape Room: Kyoto Edition
description:
A night at an exclusive movie premiere in the heart of Kyoto takes a deadly turn when a dark force awakens from the cursed ground. You'll need to work together to solve the puzzles and prove your virtue before time runs out.

–description from publisher

name: Augsburger Puppenkiste
description:
Included are four different games. Three boardgames and one quartett card game.

One game is a variation of the wellknown Malefiz.
On the second game the players work as detectives, to find and arrest some bad guys, shown on "WANTED" cards.
The goal of the third boardgame is to be first on specially illustrated event points.
All three boardgames are dice driven.
The fourth game is a standard quartett card game, where the players have to look for and complete sets of 4 cards. The player with the most card sets is the winner.

One can play the 4 games as a contest with winning points given for each game and added after all 4 games have beeen played. Or one can play just one game only.
All characters shown on pictures on the game boards are based on puppet characters from the German Puppet-on-strings Theater
Augsburger Puppenkiste.
A nice game for puppet addicts, and rather rare to find.

name: DMM GAMES Trading Card Game
description:
A trading card game series using DMM GAMES IPs, such as Orphans Order, Kamihime Project and so on.
In this game, players should construct a deck with 50 cards to fight with the opponent, like pokémon trading card game, each character card has skills which use energy to deal damage to opponent's character. The player who defeats all of the opponent's characters will win the game.
categories: Card Game, Fantasy, Video Game Theme

name: Мышкин дом (Mouse House)
description:
Mice love to visit friends. But all the houses are so similar.
So, mouse, mouse, where is your house?
How to play?
1. Select co-op or competitive mode.
2. Build a route between the houses of mouse friends.
3. Find the right house according to its features.

—description from the publisher

name: Speedy Feedy
description:
Let’s find out who has the sharpest eye and the quickest reactions! Gather your friends at the farm and hurry up to feed the animals with their favorite food.

Speedy Feedy is a fun card game for adults and children to develop attention skills. Reveal the food cards, count which food appears the most, and slap the card of the animal that likes this food!

Each round, players take 3 simple actions: reveal cards from the top of the deck, count which food appears the most, and slap the card of the animal that likes this food. There's no time to lose—the player that slaps the card first is the quickest to feed the animal. And the speediest feeder wins the game!

To make the game more challenging, add in new rules and pay close attention to details—don’t miss the flies, crows, lollipops, and pieces of cheese on the cards. Get your friends together and find out who has the sharpest eye!
categories: Action / Dexterity, Animals, Children's Game, Real-time

name: Monster Pit: Sand Dragon Set
description: This expansion for Monster Pit adds the Sand Dragon and Dwarf Necromancer Monsters.
categories: Adventure, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Deck Construction, Events, Hand Management, Market, Passed Action Token, Role Playing, Solo / Solitaire Game, Team-Based Game, Variable Player Powers

name: Heist Hustle
description:
In this game, a group of thieves, led by a "Mastermind," must collaborate to plan and execute heists. Their targets can include banks, museums, jewelry stores, casinos, corporate companies, government buildings, armored cars, check cashing locations, art galleries, and wealthy people's mansions.

The objective of the players is to accumulate the highest number of points possible throughout the game to emerge as the winner.

The game comprises 10 rounds, with each round revolving around a specific location.
categories: Card Game, Dice, Math, Party Game

name: Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock The Card Game
description:
Pit your skills against your friends and family in the Fraggle Rock Card Game. This exciting game features two games in one: “snap” and “Where’s that Fraggle?”

In “snap,” players must race to be the first to shout out “snap!” when they spot a match between two cards. It’s fast-paced, fun, and perfect for players of all ages.

In “Where’s that Fraggle?,” players must use their memory skills to match the location of a Fraggle with the corresponding card. It’s a great game for younger players, but challenging enough for adults to enjoy as well.

With colorful artwork and easy-to-learn rules, the Fraggle Rock card game is sure to bring back fond memories of the classic TV show. And with two games in one, it offers hours of fun for the whole family.
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme
mechanics: Memory, Pattern Recognition, Real-Time, Set Collection

name: G.I. JOE Deck-Building Game: Raise the Flagg Bonus Box #5
description: A promo pack for G.I. Joe Deck-Building Game contains 6 constructable Skystrikers.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Devil's Dice
description:
While exploring an old abandoned house, you have stumbled upon a book and some odd looking dice. Suddenly, a devil appears offering you and your friends a wager. Do you accept?

Devil's Dice is a lightweight dice rolling game for 2-6 player's. A twisted cross between Coup, and Liar's dice. Lie, cheat, and steal from your friends, in order to be the first to summon the devil!

Each player starts the game with two skull tokens and two dice. The dice are hidden behind a cover screen. Each die has 6 unique symbols.
Satan's pool is the board in the center which dice will be added to throughout the game.
When you've assembled all 6 symbols between your hand and the public die in Satan's pool, you declare Satan's set and win!

On your turn, you can take any of the actions listed below, regardless of whether you have the required symbols:

Imp's set: If your all your dice match, with Imp's counting as wilds, you may gain a die from the common pool. Also block Flames steal.
Skull: If you have a Skull, take two skull tokens from the common pool.
Scythe: If you have a Scythe, pay three skull tokens to try and steal a die.
Pentagram: If you have a Pentagram, re-roll the dice in Satan's pool, and if you roll any pentagram you gain up to one. Also block Scythe's steal.
Trident: If you have a Trident, Take three skull tokens from another player, or block someone from using Trident on you.
Flames: If you have a Flame, Steal 1 skull token from another player, and re-roll your current hand.

Any player may challenge your action or block(claiming you are lying about having the requisite symbols). When challenged you must then reveal your dice hand. If you are caught lying, the action or block is cancelled, and the challenger steals a die from you. If you were telling the truth, instead the challenger loses a die and rolls it into Satan's Pool, and play continues after.

—description from the publisher

name: Hallihallo Kalmario!
description:
How does the little squid Kalmario grow up so quickly? In the HABA game for children aged 4 and up, the respective tentacle tiles must be placed in the right order. This requires skill and a good memory. Whoever has the necessary bit of luck and completes the sea creature with the matching octopus tentacle tips first, wins the fun children's game in bring-along format.

—description from the publisher

name: Kalambury De Luxe
description: Kalambury De Luxe is a well-known and beloved party game in a new, unique edition. Over eight hundred phrases in five categories, for you to act out or draw! Try to control bursts of laughter as you guess Pictionary with your team!

name: Escape from the Movie Studio
description:
Lights, camera, escape! Desperate to catch a glimpse of the hottest new action flick, you snuck into the Escape Pictures movie studio to watch the filming in progress. You'll have to make a dramatic exit though, because the brawny head of security has caught you lurking and your only hope of safety lies with a coded note. You'll have to think fast if you want to stay alive to watch the sequel!

There are twelve different puzzles and each solution will translate a single letter of the note. Only once all twelve puzzles have been solved will you be able to make your escape from the Movie studio.

name: Dice Dribble
description:
It's time for kick-off, the referee blows the whistle, and the match is underway. The stadium is buzzing in the sunshine, the stands are packed, and the crowd roars in ecstasy. Your passes are precise, and your dribbling is on point - everything seems to be going as planned.

But then it happens - you stumble over your shoelace and end up being dribbled on the bleachers. Suddenly, the opponent advances on the field while you're still down, biting the grass!

Anything can happen in Dice Dribble - the dice game for those who love soccer! Dice Dribble is a Yahtzee-like dice game for all soccer enthusiasts. Attack and defend using the various symbols on the dice. The first to score three goals wins the match!
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Re-rolling and Locking, Set Collection

name: Footboard Classic
description:
Footboard is a football strategy game for two players.

It is designed to replicate the experience of playing as an entire team in real-time, with its closest equivalent being abstract strategy games such as chess.

There are no playing cards or extraneous assets, just two dice (each) and your footballing brain!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Impulse Movement, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Chaos Control Game
description: Collect at least five tokens to cross the three dimensional ring and unblock the final level. Be the first to reach the diamond and save the earth from the evil Dr. Eggman, but watch out: along the way you will find lots of challenges to overcome! Who will be the fastest?

name: Underwater hunters
description:
A group of divers take a part in a challenge. They try to collect the most various and the biggest collection of fishes. The deeper you dive the more fishes you can catch... but be careful! You can also loose everything. You can use fishing net and harpoon. A shrimp can replace every fish in a collection. Be aware of the wave - it can destroy all your collections.

The game uses push your luck and set collection mechanisms. It is an entertainment for players who love colecting and taking a risk. There is a big interaction beteween players. The rules are quite easy and the time of play is quite short: 20-30 minutes. The box is small, you can easily take it everywhere you want.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Push Your Luck, Race, Set Collection

name: Mini Cornhole
description: Catapult tiny bean bags at mini cornhole boards with finger catapults in this tabletop version of a tailgate favorite.

name: 1990's: A Decade of Trivia
description:
Put your Discman down, turn off Cheers... and get ready to play the game that is all that and a bag of chips. Yes Everybody Loves Raymond and they'll all love this 90's Trivia card game too. Aaaawl righty then, lets do this Ace!

This trivia game is conveniently packed in travel sized packaging making it great for long road trips! Be the first player to answer two questions in all five categories. Movies, music, TV, sports, & culture.

name: Splice
description:
Strategic stacking and hand management with unique DNA pieces

Draw and play cards to rearrange the sequence of DNA base pairs to score points.

Start by stacking 6 base pairs on the stand. Each player gets dealt 4 cards face down. On your turn you may play up to 3 cards to rearrange the stack to meet one of the scoring criteria on a card from your hand.

Winner is the first to score 10 points.

name: Itzi Blitzi Bäm!
description:
Speed is king in the party game Itzi Blitzi Bäm! because whoever finds the right terms the fastest wins. For example, you are looking for a carbonated drink that begins with "C" or a dog command that starts with "S".

Once you get good at that, move on to the next mode in which the colors and symbols on the letter cards also matter.

name: SUDEGO
description:
SUDEGO, a.k.a. スデゴー is a game about the sustainable redevelopment of a once prosperous but now run-down island.
You pioneer islands, gather resources and build bases for redevelopment.

On a turn, you choose either pioneering action or building action within your area of activity on the board.
By pioneering action, you can pick up and cut through the terrain tile (dump,ruins,and so on) on the board that block your way and turn them into resources and get them and widen your area of activity.
By building action, you can build base chip (village, city, and so on) on the board using the resources you obtain, scoring points and even narrowing other players' area of activity.
These simple two actions are repeated, and the player with the highest final score is the winner.

There are more than 500000000000000000000000000000 initial terrain patterns on the island where the game takes place.
So you will enjoy the development of a different game each time.

Also, SUDEGO includes 17 Goals cards, each with a unique effect, and if you wish, you can play with them in a game to create a new playing environment.
The game also includes rules for team play when you have four players.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Enclosure, Modular Board, Once-Per-Game Abilities, Team-Based Game, Variable Set-up, Victory Points as a Resource, Zone of Control

name: Monopoly: Yellowstone
description: All’s fair in love and land in this ultimate game for Yellowstone fans! MONOPOLY: Yellowstone lets players buy, sell, and trade well-known locations anchored by the Dutton family’s coveted cattle ranch, including Kayce and Monica’s House and the Painted Horse Casino & Hotel. Gear up with collectible cowhand-related tokens and post Wranglers and Foremen to secure your grounds to be the last operator standing with custom Yellowstone currency to win!
categories: Dice, Economic, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Negotiation
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Town Constructor
description:
Town Constructor is a print and play roll and write game for 1-100 players. Players take the role of town planners to make the wealthiest and most efficient cities they can.

Players play in turns. Each round available buildings for construction and values are changing. The player is the one to decide which dice will determine the market values change, and what buildings will be built this turn. Players look at theirs own town plans and draw buildings to make the most efficient town. Furthermore there are public buildings which need to be drawn in tactical places, because each of them scores in a different way. The trick is to draw the best town possible and score in the right moment, when the market values are high in scored region of the map.

All you need to play is 2 standard 6 sided dice, writing tool and print of a game sheet.

name: Match-It Food
description: The playing cards will be distributed equally among the players. One card will be put in the middle of the table. Every player can only see his top card. The first player who sees the matching symbol of his card and the one in the middle shouts his symbol and puts his card on the pile. The first player who has put all his cards on the pile, wins the game.

name: Tanto Cuore: Edith Shirring
description:
This version of the card came from RightStufAnime.com with a scratch off and redeem attached to the front of the card.

PR54: Edith Shirring (New - Private Maid)
mechanics: Action Points, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Take That

name: Social Humor
description: An Indian party game, which is essentially Indian Cards Against Humanity.
categories: Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: Scaccia il virus!
description:
A memory game to fix 10 rules to prevent illness. Move the four researchers to find the right match, avoiding five virus tiles; of you get One you could use the masks.
The attention to corona virus 19 makes It kind of obsessive.

name: norT
description:
norT is a two-player futuristic programmable-movement Print and Play racing game that plays out on a 20x20 grid. Players must avoid the outer walls, explosive mines, and even each other.

Players choose from three different racecars that have different characteristics: a car that's easier to turn will have less varied special abilities.

At the start of each turn, the race grid is covered so it can no longer be seen.

Two D6s are then rolled. The numbers rolled indicate possible Speed values. A single die result can be used for its face value, or the two face values can be added together or subtracted. So a roll of 3 and 4 present valid choices of either 3, 4, 7, or 1.

After the roll, players try to be the first to call out a Speed Value and a Direction (Left, Right, or Straight). If the fastest player's Speed Value call was valid, they have won the 'Call', and the player marks on the paper what they called out. The other player will then, at their leisure, choose a different valid Speed Value, as well as a Direction, and marks this on the paper.

Only after both sets of movements are written down is the game grid uncovered, and lines are drawn indicating where the cars have traveled. The player who won the call draws their line first.

A player wins when their opponent explodes. If both racers survive 18 rounds, then the player who traveled further during the Straights wins.
categories: Dice, Print & Play, Racing, Real-time, Science Fiction
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Line Drawing, Paper-and-Pencil, Player Elimination, Programmed Movement, Race, Real-Time, Square Grid, Variable Player Powers

name: Diavolo
description:
Solitaire Deck builder game using standard 40 card Italian deck or 52 card poker deck.

Plunge into the depths of hell and slay the prime evils and their servants.

You will take 1 of 4 actions each turn by playing cards (attack, buy, rest, or banish). You may not take the same action 2 turns in a row and each action has value and suite requirements.

You will work to cull weaker cards, buy stronger cards, and fight enemies as you build a stronger deck over the game.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Leviath
description:
Leviath is the second episode of "kaiju on the earth" series.

One player will act as a monster "Leviath". Other players will act as a member of Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force. The battle take place in Okinawa. As the location of the monster is a hidden information, defense force players are required to co-operate and determine the location of the monster and capture it before the end of day 4. They are also need to protect their battleships and barriers to avoid serious damage.

name: Hostage Negotiator: Career – Year 0 Promo Cards
description:
Includes 5 Year 0 promo cards to optionally be used at the start of a Career.

-description by the publisher's website

name: Hostage Negotiator: Frustration Die
description:
A promotional die that has successes on 5 sides! But if you roll an X, you lose!

-description from publisher's website

name: Black Stories: Spiel 2023
description:
Exclusive Promo for Spiel Essen 2023

In Black Stories the players try to reconstruct the crime by asking, guessing and fiddling about. A card game just right for any party.

One player, the Chief, takes one of the cards and reads it secretly. The front of the card has the mystery, the back the solution. Then the player reads the front of the card to the other players and shows them the illustration. The other players are the detectives. Singly and together, they try to solve the mystery by asking the Chief questions. But the Chief can only answer Yes, No, Close, or Not Relevant.

name: Cat Sushi Masters
description:
A card based party game for 2 to 6 adults and children that will turn you into hungry cats ready to dive on tons of... Catilicious sushi!

The goal of the game is to eat more sushi (and get more points) than the other players and become the next Cat Sushi Master!

Each round, players will fight with ancient instruments (bowl, sticks and napkins) to get theyr desired sushi card.

Each card grants points and wasabi points, used to buy upgrades in the kitchen, right after the fight.

Upgrades are split between ancient recipes (which let you score more point at the end of the game) and sensei shef (the actual Cat Sushi Master) techniques (which help you in fights)

The game ends when ther's no more sushi!
Tally the points and who has the most it's the next CAT SUSHI MASTER!

-description from designer
categories: Animals, Card Game, Fighting, Humor, Party Game
mechanics: Market, Rock-Paper-Scissors, Set Collection, Turn Order: Progressive

name: Disney Lorcana: Donald Duck Musketeer Promo
description:
Donald Duck Musketeer Spiel 2023 Promo card.

Abilities:
Bodyguard
Stay alert! (During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive)
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game

name: War of the Floating Islands of your Imagination
description:
Your dreams are at war.

In this Make-As-You-Play solitaire game, you will take control of one of the "islands of your dreams" that YOU create and name and lead it in battle through the gauntlet of all of the other islands, two enemies at a time. (Whether your dreams are fanciful or twisted is none of my concern.)

To start your campaign, you will need 8 blank cards for making your islands (and more blank cards later on) and a standard deck of 52 playing cards (no jokers).

Each island in the game is represented by an arrangement of standard playing cards. An attack from one of these cards can target any card of the same suit or rank within an enemy island. (For example, a 7 of diamonds can knock out any 7 or any diamond.) Islands are eliminated when they cannot attack anything or when all of their cards have been targeted. YOU are in control of every attack, whether from your island or from an enemy, with the goal of keeping your own self afloat.

If you can last until your island is one of the last two floating, those two islands will grow and gain special abilities, and you will create a new island (making future games more difficult to win)! Your premature elimination will see your island start to crumble (making future games easier) or possibly collapse entirely (...much easier).

-description from designer
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Legacy Game, Move Through Deck, Once-Per-Game Abilities, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Unsolved Crime Cases: Tod in den Alpen
description:
In this thrilling crime escape game, an exciting case awaits you in the middle of the Alps. Trapped in the snow and completely isolated from the outside world, a cold-blooded murder takes place in a small hotel. This can only mean one thing: The perpetrator is still in the hotel! But who was it? And will the murderer strike again? Maybe you will find something in the hotel rooms that will put you on the right track? Visit all the places related to the case, collect clues and evidence, question the witnesses and interrogate your suspects in an exciting multimedia finale.
Assist the hotel guests in this mysterious case and collect real evidence. You can record all your investigative progress on the clue board. Who will think creatively enough and convict the perpetrator? Only in the multimedia finale will you see whether you are right with your conclusions. A case for real investigators!

—description from the publisher

name: The Ingenius Eight
description:
The new trick taking card game!

Playing together with your partner or partners the goal is to make 3 out of 5 tricks with your team.
Every round new trump cards are chosen randomly by 2 players, with the remaining players having to find out which those are as the round goes on.

The option for betting and bluffing adds a whole new dimension to the game.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Team-Based Game, Trick-taking

name: Confirmation
description:
Confirmation is a trick-taking game that was published in the 1994 book, "The Trump Game" (ザ・トランプゲーム), in Japan.

It is a must-follow game for 4 players, in which players will earn points by winnings tricks and hitting their bid. In the game, you bid at the end of the hand, however, in one of the oldest examples of this mechanic.

Specifically, players will play all but the last card in their hand, and this card determines their bid. Alternatively, a player can declare their bid earlier in the round by setting a card from their hand face up in front of themselves, but they only receive half as many points for hitting their bid.

The player with the most points after several rounds wins.

name: Treasure by Torchlight
description:
Treasure by Torchlight is a single player dungeon exploration game. The dungeon tiles are shaped like puzzle pieces so they can fit together seamlessly and allow for dungeons to be randomly generated and unique.

As you explore you’ll encounter enemies and treasure, but you’ll also be running out of fuel for your torch. If your torch goes out while in a dungeon things will suddenly get significantly worse, so keep that torch LIT!

Play as one of 3 different heroes, each with their own special abilities. Return home with your loot, exchange your treasure for items at the shop, select new quests to tackle, and re-enter the dungeon to level up your character and take on the final boss!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Modular Board, Movement Points, Pieces as Map, Role Playing

name: Iranian Mythical Creatures Card Game
description:
Learn Iranian mythology and monsters while playing a familiar card-shedding game with these custom cards.

Compete against other Iranian mythical creatures based on their Intelligence, Strength, Agility and Magic, ranked from 1-10. Strategically play the special command cards to beat your opponents.

In the decorative box, there are 52 gold-dipped cards:
12 Mythical Birds
12 Divs (beasts)
12 Jinns
12 Mythical Marine Creatures
4 Supreme Creatures

The player that uses all of the cards in their hand, before other players, wins.

Celebrate Iranian culture with these intricately designed cards and game.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Hand Management, Lose a Turn, Matching, Take That

name: Tanto Cuore: Tamara Orlova
description:
This version of the card came was an exclusive promo from ComicCon 2016.

PR37: Tamara Orlova (Russia)

During your Starting Phase
Put this card at the bottom the pile of Private Maids in the Town. Gain +2 Servings. You cannot use this effect if there is no Private Maids pile.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Mature / Adult
mechanics: Action Points, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Take That

name: On the Way Down Highway 401
description:
Put your knowledge of Southern Ontario to the test.

Charades, songs and multiple choice questions are on the menu.

Are you ready to discover Ontario's big cities?

On the way down Highway 401 is a classic trivia-type game. First we form 2 teams and appoint a facilitator and the game can begin! We offer 3 game modes, each more entertaining than the last.
“Classic” mode requires you to accumulate 10 points (or 10 cards) to win. In “Retention” mode, teams have the privilege of eliminating players from the opposing group with each correct answer.

name: Total Domination: KS Exclusive Set
description:
Contents:

4 V2 Rockets miniature set
4 Peace Cards expansion
7 plastic damage markers


Peace cards are played from the hand with an additional card from the top of the draw deck. You add the OP's from both cards and may spend them on any operations.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

name: Who's In The House?
description:
A robbery takes place in the most crowded house ever, nothing is safe and everyone is a suspect!

Are you the thief? Collect everything you can and escape before it's too late! The police are already on the lookout and if he catches you the game is over.

Aren't you the thief? Pick up as many objects as you can, but be careful who you cross paths with, after all, no one knows who is who or even who else is at home... From Publisher.
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Humor, Party Game
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Hidden Roles, Movement Points

name: Possibly safe energy drinks
description:
If you don't drink, you can't win — and if you drink too much, you lose. Enjoy the dilemma.

Possibly safe energy drinks / ぎりぎりエナドリ is a card game in which you build up energy drinks one card at a time, trying not to overdo it.

name: Ninjanken
description:
Ninjanken / 忍者んけん is a rock/paper/scissors-style game in which you can throw one of five "jutsu" (hand symbols) against other players to try to defeat them and gain scrolls.

Each round, each player simultaneously throws a jutsu while holding a Ninjanken summary card with their other hand. When a player scores by landing rock vs. scissors, etc., they move their finger along the scroll chart on their card to show everyone else their score; additionally, they must fold down the jutsu they used, which means it's now off limits for them to use.

To reset their jutsu, they must throw the "okay" jutsu — but if someone throws the "devil horns" jutsu at the same time, then the player slides their finger toward the bottom of their card. If they get horned again, they're out of the game!

name: Monster Pit: Darkvern Promo Pack
description:
Originally available in Pack Archer from Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

Sir Vurat
Tellari Knight

Role: Attack
Type: Cleric
Cost: 5
Ability: During combat against Sir Vurat's Captain, Creatures roll one less Yellow Die. Passive.


Darkvern

Role: Attack/Defend
Cost: 4
Ability: Roll 4 Red. All Captains injure a character in their Outpost for each Monster result and gain 2 Gold for each Captain result. Do not re-roll enchanted results. Then remove this card.


Magic Carpet

Role: Attach
Cost 4
Ability: The attached character can have a maximum of three items. Discard back to two items if this card is returned or removed.


Obsidian Candle

Role: Attach
Cost 5
Ability: Must be used at the Town Hall of any Tavern. Night Phase - Monster and Encounter cards may not be played until the next Round's Night Phase. Remove this card after use.


Battle Helmet

Role: Attach
Cost: 5
Dice: 1 Yellow, 1 Red
Ability: Must attach to a Hero or Outlaw. The Battle Helmet's dice must only be used in combat (ignore limits).

name: Tridio C
description: Tridio C is a cooperative game in which players must work together to solve tough spatial puzzles. All players sit around the game board. By mutual agreement, they will place a number of cubes in a certain arrangement in the middle of the board. Each player receives an assignment card with which he can provide part of the solution. With this card he can find out what the view from his side should look like. One by one, a player places a new cube and must consult with the other players for the final position. If the players have found the cube arrangement that matches all the cards within the agreed time, then all players have won. Tridio C is a unique, beautifully executed game and comes with a clear manual. Tridio C is also a perfect game for highly gifted people and for management training

name: Don't Go In There: Ouija Board Promo Pack
description:
Originally available in Pack Cleric from Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

A new set of Cursed Cards for the 2023 Dice Tower annual Kickstarter fundraiser.

At Game End: Dispel 2 ouija boards. If not dispelled take 3 ghosts.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Horror
mechanics: Constrained Bidding, Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Push Your Luck, Selection Order Bid, Set Collection, Variable Set-up

name: Color Koi
description:
Color Koi is a roll and color game where players roll dice and color their koi fish in their ponds. The game is designed for 1-99 players and takes around 20 minutes to play.

The game is played over a series of rounds. On each turn, one player roll two dice then each player decide which dice use to color in his koi fish. The game ends when all players have completed their koi pond. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Paper-and-Pencil, Pattern Building, Set Collection, Square Grid

name: Tutti Quantum
description: Welcome to the world of fundamental particles! Here, the rules of Quantum Mechanics and Einstein's Relativity make particles appear from nowhere, travel through walls and behave in extraordinary ways! Will you ever be able to understand how it functions? With Tutti Quantum, you'll learn seven simple rules for connecting particles so you can build the most extravagant Feynman diagram. Each graph corresponds to a real-world particle phenomenon, whether that is an explanation of the blue sky or the discovery of the Higgs boson. The rarest processes are worth a Nobel prize... and if you find them, you'll win - the game, that is!

name: Star Wars: Survive the Sarlaac
description:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in the Star Wars universe with “Survive the Sarlacc”! Brace yourself as the menacing Sarlacc unfurls its tentacles and prepares to devour all who dare to enter the Great Pit of Carkoon. Will you be the last player standing?

Relive the iconic Sarlacc Pit battle scene from Star Wars: Return of the Jedi (Episode VI) like never before. Celebrating the 40th Anniversary of this legendary film, Survive the Sarlacc transports you back to Tatooine, where you can immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action and become a part of the epic battle.

Designed for Star Wars enthusiasts and true fans alike, this game is a must-have for your collection. Suitable for ages 8 and up, Survive the Sarlacc accommodates 2–6 players and offers an average gameplay time of just 15 minutes, ensuring fast-paced excitement for all.

Inside the box, you’ll find a range of captivating components, including 42 Defense cards, 15 Tentacle cards, 12 Action cards, 6 Character tokens, 6 Special Ability cards, 1 Almighty Sarlacc card, and a meticulously crafted Pit of Carkoon game board. Rest assured, the game is printed using FSC paper and soy inks, making it environmentally friendly and recyclable.

Players draw from the circle of cards placed around the Sarlacc Pit. Defence cards are for protection, action cards can help or hinder, hero cards inflict an attack, and tentacle cards will try to drag you into the pit.

But watch out, the greatest threat of all is the mouth of the Almighty Sarlacc!

Will you be the last player standing?

Gear up, choose your character, and prepare for an adrenaline-fueled struggle for survival in the jaws of the Sarlacc. Survive the Sarlacc is your ticket to an unforgettable Star Wars gaming experience. May the Force be with you!
categories: Card Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction

name: ศึกประชันพลังเหมียวหง่าว  (Catlosseum)
description:
This is a trick-taking cat game that players take on the role of Cat Commander who plans to send cat to colosseum. Strategy and planning are key factors in winning in this battle of glory.

—description from the designer
categories: Animals, Card Game, Number, Party Game

name: DECO
description:
A remastering of Yahtzee mechanic with a new twist. Make dice combinations of 5 dice and use them to compete on six game tracks: leap over your opponents, build ramps, and play super combos. Use your cards to influence the dice and make super moves. The final victory points depend on the position on the tracks.

In addition to the main competitive mode for 2-5 players and the solo mode for 1 player, there is also a campaign challenge with various in-game achievements.

The game tracks are double-sided and three-layered. Double-sided components with different tracks, combos and quests tokens make the game highly replayable.

The game is graphically designed in Art Deco style. The elegant design may appeal to classic game lovers.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Race, Track Movement

name: Dream Apartment
description:
Humans don't care about its community, they just don’t!
Paws to business! Gather around your best domestic animals team and try to look after it.
But, careful! There's another team of stray animals whom will try to destroy it.

Animals go to work to the city to gather resources and use them to achieve goals, rest in its apartments. Use cards from you hand to activate effects. Block the enemy team by cancelling their actions.

The team that has the most points at the end of the game, wins!
categories: Abstract Strategy, Animals, Dice, Print & Play
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Push Your Luck, Resource to Move, Take That, Team-Based Game, Turn Order: Pass Order, Worker Placement

name: Champions of the Hundred Halls
description:
Champions of the Hundred Halls is a captivating 1-4 player coop strategy card game set in the bestselling Hundred Halls universe by Thomas K. Carpenter.

Players must work together to defeat various scenarios from the books like a demonic invasion, or a delve into a trap filled dungeon while dealing with complications from the realm you're fighting in.

The game sets up quickly, is simple to learn, and lasts 50-90 minutes with various levels of challenge available.

The deluxe edition has an impressive 640 cards which includes 9 player decks, 6 scenario decks, and 5 realm decks including over 320 unique cards. The high variation ensures a rich and varied gaming experience every time. The game is a must-have for strategy card game enthusiasts, promising endless hours of engaging and strategic play, or play some of the easier combinations for a fun family game night.

—description from the designer

name: Amherst-Opoly
description: Amherst-Opoly is a Monopoly clone based on the town of Amherst, Nova Scotia. Board squares are replaced with local businesses, landmarks, and main streets of the town.
mechanics: Auction: English, Auction/Bidding, Income, Loans, Lose a Turn, Ownership, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Track Movement, Trading
publishers: Late for the Sky Production Company

name: La Última Meiga
description:
It is clear that they are coming for you, will you be able to survive?

In the Last Meiga you wake up in a dark cell. Your last memory is of being detained while you were going to the town market. You have been accused of witchcraft and now you have to deal with the consequences

Choose a name for your character with which from now on the Inquisition will address you, you will use the questions from the deck of cards to resolve the situations and try to survive.

Everything the cards say is true, so you'll have to use persuasion to save yourself.

Read the cards aloud.
The accused parties respond.
Vote and choose.

La Última is a narrative game system created by Roberto Alhambra.

An adventure with 30 cards, in which each of them will pose situations that you can only get rid of with your best arguments. The trial begins. Will you burn or survive?

---

Está claro que van a por ti, ¿serás capaz de sobrevivir?

En la Última Meiga despiertas en una celda oscura. Tu último recuerdo es el de ser detenida mientras ibas al mercado de la villa. Has sido acusada de brujería y ahora te toca lidiar con las consecuencias

Elige un nombre para tu personaje con el que a partir de ahora la Inquisición se dirigirá a ti, usarás las preguntas del mazo de cartas para resolver las situaciones e intentar sobrevivir.

Todo lo que plantean las cartas es cierto, así que tendrás que usar la persuasión para salvarte.

Lee las cartas en voz alta.
Las partes acusadas responden.
Votad y elegid.

La Última es un sistema de juego narrativo creado por Roberto Alhambra.

Una aventura con 30 cartas, en las que cada una de ellas te planteará situaciones de las que solo podrás librarte con tus mejores argumentos. El juicio comienza. ¿Arderás o sobrevivirás?

name: Clika!
description:
Clika! is a boardgame focused on observation, memmory and speed, specially suited for playing with the family. Designed in order to play, learn and laugh.

A card will be flipped each turn with a limited information of a member of "La Clika". You'll have to be the fastest and cover the appropriate member with your hand. The fastest will earn the card. At the end of the game, the player with most cards is the winner.

But it's not that easy. Member cards will be progressively turned face down and you'll need to remember its position and information.

Clika! is a part of the sociomusical educational project "La Clika" and created by "La Juganera" and "Xarxa de Cases de la Música".

name: Kill Draugr Kill
description:
Kill Draugr Kill is a solo print and play tower defense game. Draugr move toward the player, represented by a draugr track.
To kill draugr, the player must flick dice (representing arrows) onto zones that have various effects.
You need headshots to kill draugr. Kill all the draugr before they reach you to win.

name: Esoteric
description:
In this city, there have been numerous unsolved cases dating back in time, and in order to unravel their truths, top-notch detectives from around the world have been summoned. You are one of the summoned detectives and will gather clues about the incidents. By exploring the city, collecting necessary information and evidence, and utilizing your unique investigative method called "Esoteric Profiling," you will get a glimpse into the heart of the events. Furthermore, by hiring assistants and utilizing familiar items, you will approach the truth behind the cases. Your challenge to unravel the mysteries of the unsolved incidents that remain in the city begins now.
- from publisher

Esoteric is a roll and write game where detectives draft from five rolled dice to gain resources in polymino shapes on their player sheet in the exploration phase, then use those resources to gather evidence with polymino shapes in another grid on their player sheet. These collected pieces of evidence are used to score in different ways at the end of the game.

name: Hands Off My Pecker
description: A set-collecting party game where the goal is to rescue birds before poachers get them. Each player is dealt three cards and must play one, and discard one, per turn. Each card has unique abilities, such as stealing a card from another player's hand or drawing from the discard pile. If at any point you have less than 3 cards you are eliminated. The first player to collect a full set of birds wins.

name: Mickey Mouse Game
description:
The third volume out of 6 of the Mickey Mouse Library Games collection. The cards are designed to be dominoes with numbers ranging from 1 to 7, and these characters:

Mickey Mouse
Minnie Mouse
Pluto
Big Bad Wolf
Three Little Pigs
Donald Duck
Ferdinand the Bull
Clara Cluck


The game plays like dominoes where only a 1-1 card can be played first, and then players can either match on the end of cards already down on the table, or draw a card if they don't have one to match. If the drawn card is playable, play the card, if not then your turn passes.
The round is over whenever someone runs out of cards, and score is the sum of all the opponent's hands.
The first player to reach 50 wins the game.
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Zerywia: Pochara Expansion
description:
Pochara, the Monstrosity (huge scale model) with 6 Pochara Saprolings minis & 6 Garrisons minis. 30 Cards (Scenario and Enemy).

Pochara Expansion Components:
1 Pochara Monstrosity miniature (resin, pre-assembled, unpainted)
6 Pochara's Offspring miniatures
6 Garrison miniatures
30 Cards
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fantasy, Mythology
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Solo / Solitaire Game, Storytelling

name: Bunnies Patrol
description:
It’s Christmas, but Santa’s presents were stolen! What a disaster it would be if it wasn’t for the brave bunnies’ team who decided to investigate this unacceptable crime.

Now the Bunnies Patrol has to find all the presents and give them back to Santa before the sly thief Fox gets to Santa’s house.
On their way to Santa, Bunnies will find Lost Presents, use Burrows to get from one place to another quickly, and face different obstacles like Ice Holes that they’ll have to jump over.

Every game can be unique as you can rearrange the game board each time you play! Remember that you play as a team, so no one must be left behind — everyone must get to Santa’s house in time to win.
Hurry up, Bunnies Patrol, to save Christmas for the whole world!

—description from the publisher

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dungeon Scrawlers – Heroes of Waterdeep: Mini-Dungeons Promo Pack
description:
Originally available during the Game Boy Geek Season 11 Kickstarter campaign.

Set of four promotional mini-dungeons cards. They should be shuffled into Mini-Dungeons deck, expanding the pool of available cards.
categories: Action / Dexterity, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Maze, Real-time
mechanics: Line Drawing, Multiple Maps, Point to Point Movement, Race, Real-Time, Variable Player Powers

name: Vanlife: le jeu!
description:
Find out what your vanlifer profile is thanks to this board game which is aimed at adventure enthusiasts of all ages. With family or friends, you will develop your experience by planning your trip, improving your equipment and learning to manage your resources well.

Throughout your evenings, you will discover 100 “spot” maps magnificently illustrated in the style of famous tourist posters. A real invitation to travel and road trip through the great wild natural spaces.
Sharing and helping each other between players will also be values ​​that will be rewarded throughout the game. The player who has avoided pitfalls and obtained the most experience to reach great spots wins the game!

name: FUCAZUL!
description:
In the blue city there are several cars, but there is one that awakens great emotions in people wherever it passes: the FUCAZULl! Scientists and sociologists cannot explain what this car generates in people. The only certainty is that when FUCAZUL appears, chaos is guaranteed! Let's bug your mind, test your luck and end the day at cards! Enter this incredible world of 3 games in 1 with Fucazul.

Game 1
The game 1 aka "FUCAZUL!" is a dexterity game that aims to collect as many fucazul (beetle cars) cards as possible. In case of a tie, whoever has the most car cards wins. If the tie persists, the victory is shared.

Game 2
The game 2 aka "Where is my Fucazul?" consists of a push-your-luck game. You must go through the cards and get the highest score possible at the end of 3 games. Try to go as far as possible without stopping in a fucazul(beetle cars). Did you find a fucazul(beetle cars)?
I am sorry! You must take it to the workshop.

Game 3
The game 3 aka Fucazul Race is a trick-taking card game that has trump, dynamic super trump, and the score is a race. In this fucazul trick-taking card game your objective is to make your fucazul cross the finish line or go further than your opponents' fucazul!

—description from the publisher
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Children's Game, Party Game, Racing, Sports
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Catch the Leader, Hand Management, Matching, Memory, Trick-taking

name: A Taste of China
description:
Game Introduction:

In the vast land of China, spanning five millennia, every corner boasts its unique cuisine. As a delivery driver, your task is to freely navigate this land, delivering local delicacies nationwide and celebrating the culinary culture of each region. Transform mouth-watering dishes into city cards, view the world through the eyes of a delivery driver, and embark on a magical journey exploring the flavors of exquisite cuisine. From taking orders to picking up and delivering meals, you can traverse the mountains and rivers in seconds, visiting 57 representative cities across the country and discovering the characteristic cuisines of each.

Game Objectives:

Complete orders to earn more points.

Game Setup:

Unfold and place the game board on the tabletop.
Each player chooses and takes a pawn of the same color and three takeout boxes.
Shuffle all order cards with the back facing up, randomly reveal three cards beside the board, and place the remaining cards as the order card deck.
Deal four order cards to each player. Choose two cards, place them face up in front of you, and return the remaining two to the box.
Each player selects one card from the two face-up cards as their starting point card.
Place your pawn on the corresponding takeout city on the board according to the starting point card.
Finally, place the takeout boxes above the starting point card.

Gameplay:

Accept orders
Roll the dice to determine the number of steps to reach the destination and score points.
The first player to reach 15 points wins.

Components:

Game board x1
Order cards x57
Rider pawns x4
Dice x1
Red takeout boxes x3
Green takeout boxes x3
Blue takeout boxes x3
Yellow takeout boxes x3
Instruction manual x1
mechanics: Open Drafting, Point to Point Movement, Race

name: Worlds Fair Carnival Game
description: Throw a die to stroll around the carnival grounds of a World's Fair, spending tickets to play games and enjoying the rides. Win Prize Cards as you do so. The player who has the most complete set of Prize Cards when the game ends is the winner.
mechanics: Point to Point Movement, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Track Movement

name: Shit Happens: IJskoude winter editie
description:
Shit Happens: Ice cold winter edition! Life is hard with uncomfortable situations during Christmas and the temperatures drop below zero.

Players have to arrange cards in order of degree is misery. If a player's ranking matches that assigned by the publisher, they get to keep the card. The first player to gain ten cards wins the game.

name: Peak Courage: The Battle for Mount Hermon – October 1973
description:
At the beginning of the October 1973 Yom Kippur War, Syrian helicopter borne commandos captured the Israeli top-secret military outpost at the top of the 6,000ft Mount Hermon.

Two days after capture, the Israeli's failed at retaking the outpost in a daylight attack.

Two weeks later, they launched the second assault at night and after heavy fighting, recaptured the outpost.

Peak Courage is an area movement - impluse game that covers both Israeli assaults.

Game Scale:
Game Turn: 2 hours
Area: 1" = 340 yards / 25mm = 311 meters
Units: Individual vehicles to Companies

Game Inventory:
One 11x 17" full color map
One dual-side printed countersheet (80 1/2" counters)
One 8-page rulebook

Solitaire Playability: High
Complexity Level: Medium
Players: 1 or more
Playing Time: 1-2 hours

Note: Players will need to provide one 10-sided die and one deck of standard playing cards for game play.

name: Articulate! Christmas
description:
ARTICULATE! CHRISTMAS: Bring everyone together with this fast-talking description board game as players try to describe as many card entries as possible. But there's a new Christmassy way to play; you must complete a Christmas jigsaw to win! For each correct answer you add a piece to your jigsaw! The first team to finish their jigsaw wins!

CHRISTMAS FUN: Brimming with classic Christmas food, films, songs and traditions to describe - Christmas Articulate will get the whole family into the Christmas spirit faster than Santa gets down the chimney!
Bring the Articulate! Christmas challenge to any kind of party with friends or family and watch their competitive side come out as teams compete to win the crown!

name: Shipyard Auction
description:
Down at the shipyard, goods are unloaded off the boats and auctioned off to the highest bidder. Companies vie for the most amount of goods for the least amount of money. Timing is essential. Should you wait till the value goes down or buy the goods before your competitor does. It’s a cutthroat business and whoever has the most amount of goods wins the game.

Shipyard Auction is a auction game using a traditional deck of cards. The front side of the cards represents the valued amount of the goods. The back of the cards represents coins used to purchase the goods. Players will purchase goods on the auction block.

Players will take turns buying goods that are being auctioned off. As items are sold, goods move down the line and go down in value. The shrewd purchasing agent will buy as low as possible. When the last card is drawn, the game will come to a close. Players will count their goods by their value and the one with the most valued goods in their possession wins the game.

—description from the designer

name: LasseMajas detektivbyrå: Deckarkortspel
description:
In LasseMajas Deckarkortspel your goal is to be the first one to solve your crime by collecting cards and adding clues.

After dealing 4 cards to each player, players take turns asking one other player if they have a card matching one in their hand. If a player has the requested card type, they surrender them all to the asking player, and the asking player can then continue asking for a type of card from either the same player or different one. If a player doesn't have the card requested, he says 'På uppdrag' and the asking player then draws from a draw pile.

Once you collect 3 cards of the same type you earn the first of 3 clues. When collecting clues you need to find the 3 matching clues from the same series giving the player a complete narrative of the crime.

Whoever finds all 3 clues first has solved the crime and wins the game.
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Deduction, Memory

name: MIG Take Away: Familjekul
description:
MIG Take Away – Familjekul is a trivia game using the same rules as Mini-MIG and containing over 350 questions for all ages.

—user summary

MIG Take Away – Familjekul är ett superroligt frågespel fyllt med en härlig blandning av frågor. Vissa har samma ämne, fast med olika svårighetsnivå för barn och vuxna. Ibland får alla, oavsett ålder, samma fråga. Och i många frågor finns svarsalternativ för de yngre barnen. Alla i familjen har kul! Spelet är perfekt för mys på semestern och frågorna lockar till massor av skratt.

—description from the publisher

name: Meat Grinder Dice Wars!
description:
Most war games focus on the front-line battle; this one focuses on the cost borne by those who survive.

Your country's colony is under attack by a rival superpower, and you have fully mobilized. In the front lines you have defenders of varying degrees of combat experience, and you have your Boot Camp filled with recruits - and a pool of civilians ready to join if necessary.

If you can hold out for 12 battles outside aid from the Mother Country is scheduled to arrive to end the conflict. Fail to have a full roster in the front lines before then and you'll be overrun and defeated.

In this SOLO game, the successive "battles" are pure abstraction where the Dice Defenders come out of each battle in one of four categories: (1) dead; (2) recoverably wounded; (3) untouched & gaining more combat experience; or (4) totally burned out. Battle outcomes are measured using the roll of one RED (wounded) D6 die and one BLACK (killed) D6 die. The numbers rolled go against the Combat Experience values of the Dice Defenders. HOWEVER, once all eligible civilians are pulled into Boot Camp, morale at the colony plummets and the two D6 dice are replaced with D8 ones - potentially increasing the number wounded and killed in future battles!

With each battle engagement, the survivors become more powerful and less likely to fall into categories 1 & 2. Push their luck too far and they'll fall into category 4. The only way to avoid category 4 is to remove them to Rest & Recreation Centers for a time - which means that while they're recovering, you have fewer experienced defenders on the field to take the brunt of future RED & BLACK dice rolls.

As Commander, it's up to you to perform this balancing act of who stays in and who gets time off - at the cost of those under your command! Show too much compassion and you'll lose the war from having too few defenders on the field. Show too little compassion and you'll lose the war from losing too many defenders through their breakdown. Who stays in without recuperating and who has to come back early? All in the name of keeping the front lines fully occupied!

Do you have what it takes to make the right call, following the credo - 'Mission first; Men second'?

name: The Game of Wolf: Expansion Pack
description:
Which is stronger? The Lone Wolf or the Pack? Find out in this strategic trivia game where friend quickly becomes foe!

A unique game that is equal parts collaborative and competitive. Pick your Pack based on the player's knowledge of the subject or go Lone Wolf for a chance at double the points!

—description from the publisher

This expansion adds 125 new categories to the core game.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Party Game, Trivia

name: Frozen Shinies: The Emperor Penguin's Nephew
description:
The Emperor Penguin is a connoisseur of fine jewelry. His excitable but somewhat dim nephew, on the other hand, can't see why you'd prefer an emerald to two pointy sticks. Two is *twice as much* as one!

In Frozen Shinies, you're a royal helper racing between penguin trading shops, exchanging treasures not to get the most valuable things, but simply to get the most. Can you trade a diamond for a spool of thread, a handful of coins, and a floppy hat? The Emperor Penguin's Nephew will be delighted!

Each card has a value from 1 to 14, and most cards have a power. Place a card in the front of one stack and take cards of the same value from the front of another stack. If the values aren't quite identical, "make change" with tasty fish. Or, use a card's power to manipulate the stacks in other ways. When only one stack remains, the player with the most cards wins!

—description from the publisher

name: Peppa Pig Muddy Footprints
description:
What is the best thing about rainy weather? The big, muddy puddles, of course! Each player bounces their character in as many spaces in the game box as possible, and leaves behind muddy footprints. The first player to leave their footprints around the whole town wins the game. Practicing your motor skills is fun with Peppa Pig!

—description from the publisher
categories: Children's Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Super Quest
description:
Trivial-pursuit like game where you manage to reach the center of the galaxy answering question on 6 different science topic:

FUTURE
NEW TECHNOLOGIES
ENERGY SOURCE
BEYOND SPACE
KNOW YOUR PLANET
LIFE ON EARTH
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Дебати (Debate)
description:
A fun game where 3-16 players act as politicians taking turns to discuss both serious and light-hearted topics. To make the debate enjoyable, participants must adhere to random debate strategies, such as "mimicking a Spanish accent," "hopping on one foot during the debate," or "using made-up science to support their arguments" during rounds. The winner is the player whose argumentation and adherence to the given strategy are more convincing. The victor is chosen through voting by the other players.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Весела гра, в якій 3-16 гравців є політиками, які по черзі обговорюють як серйозні, так і веселі теми. Щоб зробити суперечку веселою, учасники дебатів повинні дотримуватись випадкових стратегій дебатів, як-от "пародіювати іспанський акцент", "стрибати на одній нозі під час дебатування", або "використовуй вигадану науку щоб підтримати себе" під час раундів. Перемагає той гравець, чия аргументація й відповідність заданій стратегії буде більш переконливою, виберають переможця через голосування інші гравці

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Party Game, Political

name: Duel
description:
Slovak quiz game based on a TV quiz show Duel.

A fun knowledge quiz game based on the successful TV quiz show DUEL, from which 984 original questions are drawn. Test your knowledge in three exciting rounds.

In the first round you will test your sharp mind and speed, in the second you can bet on your knowledge of different topics and in the third your knowledge will be tested by your opponent. Take on the role of the contestants and play your favourite knowledge game at home with your friends.

name: Monopoly: Edycja Katowice
description:
At night, Katowice comes alive with board games! Gain an advantage on the board by taking over spaces featuring iconic corners of Katowice. MONOPOLY in a new edition will captivate both native residents of Katowice and those who are enamored with the city's industrial charm, historic landmarks, and incredible concerts.

Monopoly game with Katowice theme
Features a special Katowice - European Capital of Culture token
mechanics: Auction: English, Auction/Bidding, Income, Loans, Lose a Turn, Ownership, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Stock Holding, Track Movement, Trading

name: Rettet die Arktis
description:
Players work together to safe the Arctic by leading polar bears to food sources and by helping scientists to clean up waste.
The game is played on a field of ice floes, and every turn one floe begins to crack and later sink. Will the players gather enough food and remove enough waste before all ice is gone?
The game also includes a short illustrated children's book about polar bears.
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Map Reduction, Modular Board, Movement Points, Pieces as Map

name: One Card Draw
description: 2 Players, take turns, using dry erase markers on a single card, that lists all 52 standard poker cards plus two jokers in a 9x6 grid, to cross out either a row or column, building their individual poker hand from the spots where two lines cross.

name: Evacuation: Dice Tower 2024 Promo Card
description:
A new Action Card, originally available in Eclipse Pack from the Dice Tower 2024 Kickstarter campaign.

Actions :

Build a ship
Prefab a factory

name: Roshambo Domino
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors meets Dominoes in this cute game for young children. Each player gets 10 life points and is dealt a hand of 4 cards, printed with anthropomorphic roshambo figures and a penalty value of either 1 or 2. The last card is dealt face-up to begin the domino line. Players take turns placing one card per turn to beat the open end of the last card played. If someone is unable to make a play, they lose life points equal to the points listed on the cards in their hand. The winner is the last person with life points.
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Print & Play

name: Shark Spin
description:
A thrilling game for the whole family
Your compass directs you.
Travel the high seas and pull in a record catch - but beware of the shark. Learn about real fish and shark behaviour in a fun way.
—description from the publisher

The aim of the game is to catch the most fish (by weight) as possible.
On their turn, each player spins the compass - the numbers indicate the direction and number of spaces to move. If the player lands on the mouth of a fish, they take one card from the "fish pool" of the appropriate type.
The game ends when all of the fish have been caught, or the players agree that they have done fishing for the day.
The players tally the numbers on all the fish they have caught, and the winner is the player with the highest total - the biggest catch.

name: Ecosistemas
description:
Ecosistemas, an exciting game that takes us into the fascinating kingdom of living beings, where everything is interconnected and each element is essential for survival. In this vibrant world, some act as prey, while others take on the role of predators. Do you know what each creature needs to survive? What constitutes your daily diet? Get ready to create your own food chain!

The objective of the game is clear: complete as many food chains as possible and accumulate more cards than your competitors. In Ecosystems, you will have the opportunity to explore the intricate web of life, where every choice will affect your success in creating these crucial chains. Will you be able to establish the most effective food chain and master the natural balance?

—description from the publisher (translated)

Ecosistemas, un emocionante juego que nos adentra en el fascinante reino de los seres vivos, donde todo está interconectado y cada elemento es esencial para la supervivencia. En este vibrante mundo, algunos actúan como presas, mientras que otros asumen el papel de depredadores. ¿Sabes lo que cada criatura necesita para sobrevivir? ¿Qué constituye su dieta diaria? ¡Prepárate para crear tu propia cadena alimentaria!

El objetivo del juego es claro: completa la mayor cantidad de cadenas alimentarias posible y acumula más cartas que tus competidores. En Ecosistemas, tendrás la oportunidad de explorar la intrincada red de la vida, donde cada elección afectará tu éxito en la creación de estas cadenas cruciales. ¿Serás capaz de establecer la cadena alimentaria más efectiva y dominar el equilibrio natural?

—description from the publisher

name: زیرخاکی سه سوت (Express Zirkhaki)
description:
In Express Zirkhaki, much like the original Zirkhaki, players act as diggers trying to dig for treasure and accumulate as much points as they can. The players first will remove the lowers numbered item from the deck and shuffle them and put them on one side as the "discard pile", then shuffle the rest of the items and put them on the other side as the "dig pile". The distance between the dig pile and discard pile is the "dig site".
